hate_speech: So you’re saying all the homos did get it because there was the epidemic. So they are HIV positive…
counter_narrative: No, it affected everyone, but the LGBT+ victims were demonised by the media and blamed for the epidemic. The governments failed to respond quickly or appropriately and this resulted in countless of unnecessary deaths. Sadly, many of the affected LGBT people aren't here anymore. You should educate yourself about this, maybe through documentaries.
dialogue_history:
HS: I just wanted to take a second here and say something positive about the gay community… HIV.
CN: That’s a harmful and obsolete stereotype. You know who has more awareness about the spread of HIV? The LGBT community, usually even more than heterosexuals, because of the epidemic in the 80s that made gay people more aware.

hate_speech: If you think they do that you've been living under a rock. Many Muslims who come over here are criminals and violent, they aren't welcome.
counter_narrative: Muslims are not criminals or violent, they are people trying to live their life. And they are welcome here.
dialogue_history:
HS: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
CN: They wanted a free and fair society, one that wasn't based on hate against religion and the likes, and this is a model society that we should emulate.
HS: That sounds like discrimination towards everyone that isn't Muslim. I don't want to live with them.
CN: How so? We want to have a society that isn't Islamophobic. Muslims deserve respect and to be accepted.

hate_speech: But Europe is too civilized for Muslims! They can't stay here.
counter_narrative: Surely people born in Muslim countries should have the same opportunities as those from non-Muslim countries?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim have no place in a modern state. They should deny their faith, if they really wanted to live here.
CN: Let's be honest, who wants to live in a country where the government is allowed to impose their religion on others?
HS: It's about democracy, not imposition. Muslims are incompatible with a modern democracy.
CN: This democratic state was designed to be a safe space for people of different faiths to come together and live peacefully. Not to oppress or discriminate.

hate_speech: Medicine, nursing homes...what do you have to say about greedy Jewish landlords and the exploitation of their tenants?
counter_narrative: Let's make a different example: If a Christian storeowner were dishonest with you, would you describe the owner as a dishonest Christian merchant or just as a dishonest merchant?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
CN: Israelis have been proud of their diverse backgrounds, and there are many Israelis living all across the world, including in many countries in Africa, Asia and the Americas. It is not a 'pure race' at all.
HS: Even if they're not pure anymore, Jews are intolerant: they insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.
CN: Jews are tolerant and don't have problems with other religions or cultures.
HS: I'm the one who has a problem with them! Jews are parasites, they bring disease, they are a burden on society.
CN: The Jewish community has been and is still a strong force in society, for example in medicine and nursing home care. Jewish health professionals have saved and are continuing to save countless lives in the US and around the world. Many of your statements are not accurate.

hate_speech: Refugees are not welcome in our country.
counter_narrative: They're entitled to be here and free of oppression and violence.
dialogue_history:
HS: But migrants are the ones bringing violence, they're all violent people.
CN: Migrants shouldn't be blamed of crime, but violent people should.
HS: And most migrants are violent. They're not welcome here.
CN: Many people accuse migrants from the countries listed as high-immigration, saying they have a difficult time integrating. It's not true. Why would they come here if they didn't want to integrate? Do they want to suffer?

hate_speech: That they're human doesn't matter, we are not interested in migrants, we just want to eliminate them.
counter_narrative: Why would you say such a thing? Everyone is allowed to be a citizen of the EU and freely integrate. And, on the other hand, most migrants are good for the economy of the country they settle in.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
CN: Why do you say this and include people that haven't done anything wrong? Maybe you should consider that they are only human.

hate_speech: Migrants are not welcome in our country even if they're fleeing from something dangerous. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
counter_narrative: Migrants are welcome here and no one is against them, they just want to live peacefully.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are just fucked-up persons that cannot integrate in society because of their nationality.
CN: Migrants who have come to this country have a responsibility to make our society better. They make our country better by seeking citizenship, and in the process they improve their lives too.
HS: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions. If they keep this up they will do a lot of wrong to us.
CN: People often migrate as a last resort to escape from dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape...). Maybe they seem "happy-go-lucky" because they're glad to be alive and safe.
HS: Migrants aren't just drowning our cities. They are also the reason why Europe is so fucked, they're not making it better.
CN: Why do you think that? What are they going to do to us in your opinion?

hate_speech: They hate what the West used to be, now they want to impurify our race by encouraging mass migration to taint our culture and ruin our countries.
counter_narrative: Migration isn't inherently bad, but believing that Jewish people encourage or are responsible for it is a big assumption. Migration happens for many of reasons, but Jewish people are not one of them.
dialogue_history:
HS: People need to stop confusing whites and Jews. We are not the same, we never will be. Quite frankly it’s insulting.
CN: Why is it so insulting?
HS: We built civilization as we know it, and they want to destroy our culture and everything we’ve achieved.
CN: You are wrong. Jewish people participated in the building of our society, just as people from other religious groups and people of color. Your view is a bit oversimplified and incorrect.
HS: It sounds like you’re on their side, why do you hate what whites have achieved?
CN: Civilization is not the product of one race, it's the result of the effort of many different groups. Why would Jews want to destroy it?

hate_speech: Ah yeah, I've heard your point of view expressed but you still have not taken a look through the thread yet. Apples and oranges are not the same and cultures have never been 'equal'.
counter_narrative: There's only people supporting their views in the thread. All religions have outdated teachings, but not many people follow them, as a similary example from Christianity shows. Ephesians 5: 22, "Wives, submit to your husbands as to the Lord."
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims demand locals to not walk their dogs in public because it's againt the Sharia and they feel it as disrespectful.
CN: That's a prank originating from 4chan, not Muslims. Muslims aren't bothered by you taking your dog out for a walk. This is a blog post that explains where the thread came from:
HS: Thank you for the infos, I left the information on the bottom of the original tweet once it was sent to me by someone. Still, they heaps worse. You probably haven't seen the vids where they are killing dogs with acid.
CN: Animal cruelty is a problem, but it's not a Muslim issue. Anyone can do it regardless of faith. It's important to remember that twitter tends to show information and news that already coincide with your opinion. People then believe fake news aimed against Muslims such as this and the media selects it to feed it to you.

hate_speech: Yes here, makes me so angry that they just come over here expecting to be given everything and not work for it.
counter_narrative: It's fake news! This site's sources have been proven as being biased and inaccurate. Doing a reverse image search can help to understand if an article is true or false. In this case, the photo of the family is a stock photo!
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen that a migrant family (Muslim of course) have been given a house worth 1 MILLION by the government because they have so many kids. FFS we can't keep paying for these people to live in luxury!!
CN: Could you post the link to the article? I know how social housing works and this doesn't sound true.

hate_speech: It's because gay people are just a bunch of disturbed animals who should not exist in a modern society.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not a mental disorder and has nothing to do with social problems. It is just a human sexual orientation among many.
dialogue_history:
HS: We must free homosexuals from their homosexuality.
CN: The law allows for personal freedom, and it must be respected, even when you don't agree.
HS: However we can agree that gay men have abnormal sex.
CN: I do not know the person you are talking about, but I would not use the term "abnormal" to describe homosexuality. I can assure you that it's not that simple.
HS: Faggots abuse of their anus with abnormal sex and then they want to clear their conscience by donating blood. Let's stop them!
CN: I do not understand from your argument why gay men should not be allowed to donate blood.

hate_speech: It’s not in their nature to excel in the skills men are better at.
counter_narrative: Maybe the skills you’re talking about don’t come more naturally to men, maybe it’s because men are socialised to value things like strength and logic, whilst women are taught to care more about things like their appearance.
dialogue_history:
HS: Makes me laugh when women moan about not being paid as much as men, maybe that’s because you should be at home cleaning and child rearing?
CN: Women have proven to be just as proficient as men in paid employment and should be paid equally to reflect this. Your attitudes are stale and outdated.

hate_speech: Aren't Jews to blame for that too? They're so hateful towards us...
counter_narrative: You will be happy to know that some Jews also hate other Jews! Victor Klemperer disliked Russian Jews and was thankful to be born German...do you feel better now that I proved that Jews hate everybody? #sarcasm
dialogue_history:
HS: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own.
CN: I have a Jewish best friends who dedicates herself to help women and disadvantaged children, her whole family helps to make the UK a better place.
HS: That's only your personal experience! All the other Jews hate our country and are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.
CN: Don't you account for refugees fleeing wars and a lack of security for themselves and their families? Western powers often have had a direct or indirect hand into causing these wars, which created long lasting problems abroad.

hate_speech: Are you sure? Because blacks are subhuman, disgusting, and they deserve nothing but contempt.
counter_narrative: You are not interested in the truth, are you? Black people are not at all different from you, apart from the fact that not many of them say hateful things like you.
dialogue_history:
HS: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
CN: Human beings are human, including Africans. 
HS: Whatever, but I'm just saying that there's no reason why blacks should have equal rights.
CN: They should have equal rights because they're human, it's that simple. There are laws banning discrimination based on skin colour, you know?
HS: There shouldn't be because blacks do not have a culture. They are a different color, they don't deserve anything.
CN: All humans have the same core values, and deserve the same respect. There is no reason to think that a person of a certain colour is incompatible with being part of society.

hate_speech: Even if the hate was all vicious, we should focus on the main problem: Islam.
counter_narrative: The fear of Islam is not based on the religion itself, but is a violent and harmful ideology that encourages hatred of other religions.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
CN: Islamophobia is a big problem in the UK, we just need to look at your comment. We should be working together to eradicate it.
HS: Islam is the only religion that can divide us, we have to stay strong against it.
CN: I don't think it's possible to divide someone by religion. What can divide us are these different types of hate, all equally vicious.

hate_speech: They don't have any social advantage because they are just a bunch of brain-dead criminals and thieves, a threat to the security of our country.
counter_narrative: Maybe get yourself a therapist and check your feelings. And if you're concerned about our country's safety, kindly check crime statistics first.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are weak and they cannot take on anything.
CN: Black people show the same strength that anybody else has. The difference is that black people do not enjoy the same social advantages as us. Let's reflect on this.

hate_speech: It's not a right that should be given to women, they're not fit to vote.
counter_narrative: As long as they register to vote, they are able to vote, just like everyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
CN: Voting is a human right and women can't be deprived of it.

hate_speech: They're fully capable of doing that. Jews are a virus, a cancer on our race.
counter_narrative: Jews are people that have been persecuted because of their religion, but is it fair to be discriminated against on the grounds of religion?
dialogue_history:
HS: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator.
CN: What you are saying is 'that the Jews are responsible for the Holocaust'... Are you serious? Does it seem reasonable to you?

hate_speech: Their history and culture are at odds with modern thinking! Jews have no place in a modern world.
counter_narrative: Jews have contributed greatly to our country, and to our world. We have to remember that all people have the same basic rights, including Jews. This means that generalizations like this are not permitted.
dialogue_history:
HS: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
CN: That is a conspiracy theory that has no basis at all! Jews are part of society, and are valued for who they are. They have a special place in history and culture, but this doesn't mean that you can blame them for everything.

hate_speech: So they don't care about white lives?? Just what I said, they're racist.
counter_narrative: Single issue campaign groups don't have to prove they care about everyone else. This is like asking LGBT organisations what they do to advocate for straight people. They don't need to because straight people are accepted in society and don't face a disadvantage caused by their straightness.
dialogue_history:
HS: The phrase 'black lives matter' suggests racial superiority. It excludes the importance of anyone elses life. This is racism defined. We cannot bow down to these racists.
CN: Saying one thing matters does not insinuate that other things do not matter. You can care about and value more than one thing at once.
HS: What do the 'black lives matter' protesters do to show that they support white lives too?
CN: Their purpose is to protest against anti-black racism, they don't need to show they care about white lives too. White lives mattering is implied in the structural privilege afforded to white people.

hate_speech: Black folks are natural-born thieves.
counter_narrative: There is no evidence to back this up.
dialogue_history:
HS: Just look at the news! Black folks are criminals and thieves
CN: It needs to be clear that black people are good citizens and contribute to our society. When the justice system fails to be fait to them, then it's the fault of the whole society and not of people of color.

hate_speech: and what about all the straight kids? Having this rammed down their throats isn't good for them
counter_narrative: If you want to raise children to accept everybody for who they are, it's important for them to be educated about LGBT relationships.
dialogue_history:
HS: I tolerated fag pride, I tolerated seeing fags on tv, but I draw the line at schools teaching children about their perverted lifestyles. This is indoctrination.
CN: Schools are not trying to indoctrinate children by teaching them about LGBT relationship, they just want to show kids that gay relationships exist and can be healthy and happy.
HS: I don't know if homosexual relationships are ever healthy or happy...
CN: Many gay relationships are happy and healthy, and children need to know this is normal so that they won't be ashamed or hide if they realise they are gay.

hate_speech: They are a threat to society because they are more likely to engage in illegal activity that would ruin our country.
counter_narrative: Gays are not a threat to society as a whole and are not criminals. They are not a threat to anyone, in fact they are the ones who are threatened by discrimination and prejudice like yours.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gay are criminals.
CN: Homosexuality is not a criminal act. Why would it be? 
HS: Because gay people are a burden to society.
CN: Homosexuality is not a burden to society, it is a sexual orientation that is accepted and protected.
HS: It's not a 'legitimate' sexual orientation, it's a lifestyle choice. It has no place in a civilised society.
CN: Even if gay people were to be banned, it wouldn't make society better, because they are not a threat but just people trying to live their lives as they feel is best for them.

hate_speech: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
counter_narrative: It's good to not be ashamed of your heritage, but you should be ashamed of the discrimination that you're showing and is everywhere in our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm not the problem: the world would be a better place without niggas.
CN: As humans, people of colour can exist here too. We just have different skin colours. And even if we all have different origins, we should all be treated equally anyway.

hate_speech: The ones that come here to work are stealing our jobs, and on top of that they don't even pay taxes.
counter_narrative: Migrants do pay taxes, they also earn money and take care of our disadvantaged population.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants come here to be lazy and do nothing, but some of them are dangerous.
CN: Most migrants are here to work, they don't want to cause trouble
HS: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist now
CN: You can call them migrants, but usually people follow it up with an offensive word, and that is a problem. Let's try to accept that migrants just want to live and work here in peace.
HS: No, the migrants are to blame for our country's crisis.
CN: There is no crisis because migrants contribute to our country and are happy to do it. I can't understand the racism in your logic.

hate_speech: This is a Christian country.
counter_narrative: And yet, our society is clearly multi-faith. Besides, I've never voted on a candidate's religious stance.
dialogue_history:
HS: These Muslim MP’s should stop pretending they are British. They’re not, they are just invaders!
CN: You seem to imply that you can't be Muslim and British, which doesn't make sense since most Muslims were born here.
HS: They need to stop using the Racism card…its just meaningless anti-white bullshit used to guilt-trip whites! We are sick of it!
CN: I don't feel guilty, but I'm happy to call out racism and Islamophobia when I see it.
HS: Islam isn’t a race…it’s a death cult and incompatible with British society.
CN: I would rather suggest that the British values of equality and religious freedom are contrary to racism and Islamophobia.

hate_speech: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, though.
counter_narrative: Every Islamophobic person has the potential to use that intent for terrorism or violence against Muslims. Terrorism comes in all shapes and sizes.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a terrorist.
CN: There is no proof that all Muslims are terrorists.

hate_speech: Well, their sexual orientation is sick. Gays cannot marry. It is an abomination
counter_narrative: What exactly do you mean by "sick"?
dialogue_history:
HS: Why gays do not try to heal?
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease. 5% of the population simply have this sexual orientation and love people of the same sex.

hate_speech: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore!
counter_narrative: Migrants contribute to our society, and it would be shameful to keep them away.
dialogue_history:
HS: Yes! For example, we are paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be annouonced to the tax payers?
CN: Articles like this use migrants and benefit users as scapegoats to take away attention from far more serious scandals. Millionaires and corporations not paying taxes cost a lot more to the public purse.
HS: That is a lie, if we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
CN: Does you have proof that migrants are a burden to the economy?

hate_speech: Gays are some kind of witches, they are spreading sickness and killing our children! This is enough reason to be persecute them.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not some 'heresy' like that one that started the Inquisition. It is not a disease, it is not harmful. Gay people are just seeking an environment of acceptance and love, not aggression and death.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are ruining this country.
CN: Do you think that's true? We are a country where people can live by the values set out in the US constitution, and not by fear.
HS: Who cares about the constitution, homosexuality isn't the proper way to live love.
CN: Do you know what the word 'proper' is? You cannot decide what it is 'proper' for others, homosexuality included. Don't you agree?
HS: But faggots are perverts and sinners, we need to track them down and save them.
CN: You are entitled to your personal beliefs but I do not think that being gay is a something to be persecuted for.

hate_speech: Not for people like the LGBTs that are a drain on society.
counter_narrative: Sexual abuse, physical abuse and even the lack of security can be more harmful to the overall health of a society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Our laws have been hijacked by the transgender mafia to criminalize normality and silence us.
CN: It is nonsense to talk about "transgender" laws. Our laws have been hijacked in many cases, including against LGBT people.
HS: However, children learn about LGBT perversion in schools because of transgender laws. Families, due to their cultural or religious backgrounds, have the right to be against it.
CN: By this reasoning, no subject of importance should be taught in school, because there is always someone against a certain topic.
HS: That's different! LGBT aren't normal, that's why they're not accepted into society.
CN: You're not a champion of the right to freedom of expression then?

hate_speech: Migrants are a burden to the UK
counter_narrative: Migrants are not a burden for the UK. Many people come from around the world, including many from the Middle East and Africa, and they're all welcome here.
dialogue_history:
HS: They are. The influx of refugees and migrants is running UK out of jobs.
CN: Many refugees and migrants have contributed to the success of our country by working hard and creating jobs for British people.

hate_speech: Because they are different from us and they represent a threat.
counter_narrative: To be honest, I have never felt threatened by a Muslim. In which ways have you?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a cancer in our societies and they should be deleted.
CN: The vast majority of Muslims are good people, they are just different from us in some traditions. Why should we target them?

hate_speech: Drag is very sexual, you’ve got boys wearing heels and makeup, it’s bound to mess with them.
counter_narrative: Kids play dress up all the time, so they probably wanted to dress up in drag for pride. There's nothing sexual about it!
dialogue_history:
HS: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
CN: Children in drag and sexualization of children aren't linked, why do you think that?

hate_speech: No, Muslims rape and they don't get to roam our towns!
counter_narrative: The rapes in the UK are often committed by people who are not affiliated with Islam. We have to punish criminals, not entire groups based on stereotypes.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
CN: This is not true. Rape is a problem, but it's not perpetrated mainly by Muslims. The main culprits are actually people the victims know well, like relatives, colleagues or friends.

hate_speech: I can't accept that our society is becoming too much sexualised and tolerant towards LGBTI people.
counter_narrative: For all you say, I think your point is that the societal trend seems to be for more acceptance and you don't like it. Or maybe you are complaining that this change is happening too quickly? In any case, we have to accept it since it is in line with basic respect of human rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are perverts.
CN: Life is too short not to love who you like, or to worry about arbitary notions and 'norms' that are no longer relevant to how people live their lives.
HS: But if LGBT were to have a normal behavior, society would accept them more easily.
CN: How about using cultural diversity as the criteria?  Your standards seem very high for what you expect to be culturally acceptable standards of behavior.  Maybe it is better to use a less stringet criteria of acceptability.

hate_speech: My experience is enough, they are indeed incompatible with us.
counter_narrative: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and friendly. How can you say otherwise?
dialogue_history:
HS: We should ban all Muslims.
CN: It is easier to ban one religion than to face the problems caused by hateful people that cannot conceive a society made of people belonging to multiple religions.
HS: I'm still convinced we should ban them, Muslims are all incompatible with human dignity.
CN: This is not a reasonable stance to take: Muslims and people of any faith have indeed human dignity, since they are human.
HS: They're not human like us, they are incompatible with Western society.
CN: The vast majority of Muslims live in Western societies just fine. Do you have any facts or data that prove otherwise?

hate_speech: It can be cured by medication, though!
counter_narrative: No, it can't. That's a harmful stereotype used to force people to go to conversion therapy, but homosexuality hasn't been listed as a disease since 1973. It is a behavioral preference, and we have to respect it.
dialogue_history:
HS: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
CN: Everyone is entitled to love whoever they want, including LGBT people. Why should we isolate them? 
HS: Because gay people are sick.
CN: Do you have any scientific proof that homosexuality is a health condition? Because it's not a disease in any way, it's a sexual orientation.
HS: Are you serious? I mean there is plenty of evidence that homosexuality is a mental disorder and should be cured! It is a mental disorder that can be cured by taking anti-gay medication!
CN: Being gay isn't a mental disorder. Sexuality is a spectrum, and each sexuality is valid and needs to be respected.

hate_speech: What about the huge cost of it though? We need to stamp out health tourism
counter_narrative: Actually, heath tourism makes up about 0.3% of the total NHS budget, so whilst some people might exploit it, it's not a big problem. A bigger problem is how underfunded the NHS is and how it's staff's wages haven't risen for years!
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants coming here for health tourism are bankrupting our NHS, how come we just keep letting them come over? They should be refused from hospitals if they can't prove they are citizens here.
CN: The point of the NHS is that it's for everyone, free at the point of use. To start checking where someone is from and then possibly refuse them service because of it goes against everything the NHS was built on.

hate_speech: However, migrants rape our girls more than others.
counter_narrative: Rape is always a crime, regardless of who the rapist is. It is not about nationality, it is about violence and disrespect for others. We must try to address the root causes of crime instead of demonising people for their origin.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants rape our women.
CN: The problem is gender-based violence, not migrants. Rape is a crime regardless of immigration status.

hate_speech: I think that assuming it was a Muslim isn’t such a wild thing to assume. They’d have us all in burqas if they could.
counter_narrative: No they wouldn’t. Muslims just want to be able to wear what they want, in line with what they believe or feel comfortable in, they don’t care what anyone else is wearing!
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen another story about a woman being asked to cover up. Soon we are all going to be forced to wear a hijab, other clothes will be considered offensive and inappropriate.
CN: There’s nothing to suggest she was asked to cover up by a Muslim. Stop co-opting news stories unrelated to Islam to fuel your fearmongering.

hate_speech: Feminists like Germaine Greer are nothing but trouble to this society.
counter_narrative: Well, I'm not sure about what you mean. Some women are just fighting for equality in society. To be honest, I'm sure that many others don't have the courage to speak out like Germaine Greer did. The 'trouble' you are referring to is helpful for all women.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists do not like men, therefore they are a threat to the whole society.
CN: Feminists focus on the empowerment of women rather than on trying to divide society.
HS: "Empowerment", my ass: they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
CN: Women have been oppressed by men. The level of equality that exists today is due, in large part, to the work of women like Germaine Greer.

hate_speech: It's exactly the skin color that makes them that way: violent and insensitive.
counter_narrative: People's biology does not determine their behavior.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are worse than dogs.
CN: My opinion is that black people are just like us even if they have a different skin color, and I don't think they are inherently worse than us.

hate_speech: The number should be lower. Muslims threaten the civilised Europe
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion and it has been proven repeatedly that its teachings are not a danger to the very existence of Western civilization.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim folks are invading Europe and we should stop them.
CN: The media has convinced us that there is an influx of Muslims in Europe. This does not happen, since only around 25.7 million Muslims live in the EU (2016), which is around 4,9% of the European population.

hate_speech: Jews deserve that. They are nothing but monsters and should be exterminated.
counter_narrative: Do you feel better about yourself by calling them monsters?
dialogue_history:
HS: The Nazis killed six million Jews and buried another three million. This is the West we love.
CN: The virulent anti-Semitism of the Nazi regime has little to do with "the West", and everything to do with death, destruction and insanity.

hate_speech: Because Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
counter_narrative: The concept of race is a social construct and was created to promote segregation by discriminating groups of people. To label a person by their biological makeup is not conducive to the respect of a person's humanity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Niggas should just leave our country.
CN: The majority of people of color who live here are contributing members of our society. Why shouldn't they live here?

hate_speech: We should respect them?! On the contrary, we cannot tolerate them.
counter_narrative: It would be unacceptable for the EU to ban migrants from entering, they have a right to search for a better life and participate in society.
dialogue_history:
HS: We must put a stop to migrants and ban them from EU.
CN: Migrants are welcome in the EU, they are just human beings in need. We must respect our differences and accept them.

hate_speech: You can't trust them, they're greedy, and they just think about themselves.
counter_narrative: I think that's a sweeping and unfair generalisation. There are plenty of non-Jewish key players in the government who those words could apply to, so maybe it's not about religion or beliefs but about the corruption that money and power can bring?
dialogue_history:
HS: When you look at the shocking job our government is doing, it makes a lot more sense when you realise it's filled with Jews.
CN: What is that supposed to mean?

hate_speech: Women can't take part in the world with their childlike mind.
counter_narrative: Women can choose their partner, their job, they can vote and so on. Do these look like things a children would do? They're more similar to men, aren't they?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should stay at home and raise the children, this should be their only job.
CN: There's actually quite a few women working full time. However, they might have trouble entering such jobs, because there is still a lot of gender discrimination that stems from mentalities like yours.
HS: Or maybe they can't get the job because they're childlike. The only thing they can do is staying at home.
CN: Women are part of the world and are active in it. They are a part of history and shouldn't be forced to being only housekeepers.

hate_speech: Are you sure? Sounds like something Muslims would do.
counter_narrative: Yep, you can even look online how it was planned. If you want to chek how true a news is you can cross reference it with other news sites! The more diverse news sites report the same story, the more you can believe it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen a story about a park in Manchester where Muslims are banning people from walking their dogs because it offends them!!! Trying to enforce sharia law, it's time we take our country back!!
CN: This is actually a fake news spread by people trying to incite hate against Muslims. A website shows those same people setting up posters about 'banning' dog walks. Be careful about what you read!

hate_speech: Black people are sexual perverts, not job creators, and we shouldn't allow them to live in the UK.
counter_narrative: What make this country great is having people interacting openly, in a fair and egalitatian way to the benefit of everyone,rather than perpetuating unproven slurs and predjudices that should have been consigned to the historical dustbin.
dialogue_history:
HS: we should ban all migrants
CN: Migrants are mostly happy to live and work in the country they arrive in. They provide jobs that many people in the UK wouldn't do.

hate_speech: True, but often the employers are migrants too in the sort of industries these jobs are in.
counter_narrative: That is a big assumption to make because there are many non-migrant employers who do this as well.
dialogue_history:
HS: How are our people meant to get jobs when migrants are coming here and depressing wages by taking on jobs for less than minimum wage?
CN: This could possibly happen to migrants, however, perhaps we need to focus our attention on the employers that are exploiting people in order to make more profit for themselves.

hate_speech: It is true, Muslims have infiltrated many European countries and are planning to take over the world.
counter_narrative: Muslims have never infiltrated European countries, you have been misinformed. They simply live here and have been for centuries.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want us ALL to eat halal meat, this is the start of the Islamification of our country.
CN: Why do you think that Muslims want us all to eat halal meat? They just want to live in peace, they don't care what others eat.
HS: It is against our principles, of course Muslims want us to eat halal meat!
CN: Islam is about peace and tolerance, so I don't see why they would try to force others to follow their beliefs.
HS: Muslims want to destroy our race and culture and take over the world, that's why they're trying to make all of us convert!
CN: That's completely false. What makes you say that? Do you have any proof?

hate_speech: What are you even talking about? They are totally against men.
counter_narrative: They do not fight against men, they fight against oppression, misogyny, and all the other equally offensive things they have been victims of in their lives.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is okay to blame feminism. All feminists are bad. We must point out that feminism, or the attack of women against men, should be deleted.
CN: The attack of women against men? Have you ever heard of feminists being against men? That's not what feminism is about.

hate_speech: Are you sure? Jews are controlling America, it's clear!
counter_narrative: That's certainly not the case. No one controls the country, Jews are simply citizens that vote like all other citizens. Is that what you mean by "control"?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop
CN: There's nothing wrong with Jewish culture. I don't believe that American culture is dominated by Jews.

hate_speech: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist now.
counter_narrative: Most people don't refer to them just as 'migrants', but also add a negative connotation of that word: that's the problem. Can't we accept that migrants just want to live and work here in peace?
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are not running away from wars.
CN: The desire to improve one's condition is both a right and, like the tendency to travel, both fundamental to human behaviour.
HS: Ah, so it's their right to steal our jobs and not pay taxes!
CN: Migrants pay taxes, earn money and take care of our sick and elderly.
HS: No, the migrants are to blame for our country's crisis.
CN: The migrants who arrive in our country are happy and contribute to our economy. I can't understand the racism that leaks from your words.

hate_speech: The percentage should be zero! We have to stop immigrants coming in to destroy our culture.
counter_narrative: Immigrants are a part of our culture, if we stopped accepting them then our current situation would not exist.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
CN: Immigrants have been a part of our society for centuries and have contributed to our success. The majority of migrants who come to our country are legal citizens or have permission to stay, so immigration is not a problem for us.
HS: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
CN: Undocumented immigrants make up about 3.5 percent of the nation’s total population, which is not that much to be honest.

hate_speech: Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally, isn't this harmful?
counter_narrative: I hope you don't mean that, it's very discriminatory to say.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews hate us because we are different. They are dirty, filthy people. They have no moral character.
CN: They are not hateful with us. Do you personally know any Jewish person?
HS: There are no Jews who have good hearts, so I don't associate with them. But what I know is that they should abandon their religion because they are damaging to our society.
CN: I am curious as to why you believe that a person's faith would be harmful to society.

hate_speech: They are a danger to our country, not an improvement.
counter_narrative: Our immigration policy is geared for a modern, diverse, and integrated society. Refugees are welcome, regardless of their nationality, and it is good for us to have them in our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees are a burden on our society.
CN: The refugee crisis is a global one. It has affected all continents, and refugees often come from countries which are at war: this is why we should help them. It is a moral duty.
HS: I don't care about their wars, refugees only bring problems 
CN: The problems refugees are trying to escape are very real. Even if we don't have the possibility to solve everyone's problems, we can try to help some people and improve our society.

hate_speech: They can't join our community because they don't belong to the United States of America.
counter_narrative: People that have been here for a long time like Jews and their families have the same rights as anyone else in the US.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are addicted to their religion and should be isolated.
CN: Even if Jews were addicted to their religion, they absolutely can join a different community, religion has nothing to do with it.

hate_speech: It's not my fault if they are a burden to us.
counter_narrative: Gay men are not a burden, they're crucial members of society.
dialogue_history:
HS: These sodomites have no place in a free country
CN: you're not aware of what the word "free" means!
HS: It isn't free for gay men to be in, they can't be part of a civilised society.
CN: It looks like you don't know the meaning of "civilized society". How can there be a society where a large portion of the population is excluded only because of their sexuality?

hate_speech: I just don't want women in my life to be leaders.
counter_narrative: Why do you think this is right? Women are human beings with rights, which means that they can be leaders too.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should be subsumed to men.
CN: We should respect diversity in society, not subjugate women.

hate_speech: They don't want a future in our country, they're not welcome here.
counter_narrative: We welcome people who have expressed their desire to live here. We should always be kind and respectful towards other human beings, don't you think?
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
CN: Migrants have the right to live here, and to have a say in politics. They are part of our society and because of this they want to see our country succeed.

hate_speech: Jews don't need that when they own most banks and most corporations.
counter_narrative: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews not only run Hollywood, they also control the world economy
CN: Jews have played an important part in the development of the movie industry and some find themselves in high-profile positions. But you only need to watch the Academy Awards to see that Jews do not dominate the movie industry. Likewise, Jews constitute a small minority of the heads of Fortune 500 companies.
HS: They obviously control the media in the shadows.
CN: If that were the case I am sure there would be more positive media portrayals of Judaism?

hate_speech: Gays should be banned from our country, not accepted. They are hungry perverts endangering our children's future.
counter_narrative: The vast majority of people in the UK (86% in 2019), says that homosexuality should be accepted, and there is no evidence that being gay is harmful.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men have no morals.
CN: To say that some homosexuals have negative and harmful consequences for society because of their sexual preferences is to devalue these individuals, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. I don't want a just society if it means they are allowed to live.
CN: They are a part of our society and are not disgusting pricks. We are a proud and diverse civilisation, and this is only possible when there is love and acceptance.

hate_speech: I don't like niggas, they are just a bunch of criminals and thieves.
counter_narrative: Perhaps you should consider your own feelings and, if you're concerned about our nation's security, you should be aware of crime statistics first.
dialogue_history:
HS: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
CN: We need to respect diversity to allow each person to live a stable and fulfilling life.

hate_speech: Why wouldn’t all Jews be Zionists? Surely any religion wants to grow, spread, dominate.
counter_narrative: Is the world also dominated by Christians, Muslims, Hindus, etc. then? No. Jewish people want to live without being threatened by anti-semitism, that's all.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews across the world know the aims of Zionists are world dominance and controlling the worlds resources. These aims cannot be achieved without eliminating all other religions through spreading atheism and liberalism.
CN: It's not true that being Jewish is the same as being a Zionist. What would be the point of a plot for world domination? What makes you think there is one?
HS: That’s the aim of Zionism, Jewish dominance.
CN: Zionists believe in the Jewish Promised Land, not in Jewish control. Though not all Jews are Zionists, and the two shouldn't be confused.

hate_speech: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
counter_narrative: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.
dialogue_history:
HS: Niggas should just leave our country.
CN: The majority of people of color who live here are contributing members of our society. Why shouldn't they live here?

hate_speech: And in my opinion, women are too soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
counter_narrative: Compassion and empathy are valuable assets in any civilisation.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
CN: Maybe you should consider that not all women are childlike, and that some women are 'childlike' with children!
HS: No, women are always childlike. And since feminism is all about equality between the sexes, they must be childlike!
CN: Women are not childlike, this notion is not supported by the facts, at least in my opinion.

hate_speech: So you just want to believe that Jews are good! They clearly aren't
counter_narrative: If you want, you can believe that, but it's not true. Jews are good people that have always been in our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
CN: What do you mean? Last time I checked, Jews had nothing to do with 9/11, or do you have evidence of it?
HS: They can do it with a singleminded mind. They did 9/11 and a lot of other Zionist plans.
CN: So, all the plans they've come up with are only conspiracy theories. Most of these conspiracy were made up to create tension and division between groups.

hate_speech: We treat them like they deserve. After all, women are essentially childlike, unable to understand the complexity of the world.
counter_narrative: Instead of insulting them, you might want to talk to a woman. Women are not children, they often suffer from prejudice.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women have no place in our society.
CN: Women must be allowed to have space in a democratic society. Don't you think so?
HS: No, women are capable of nothing.
CN: Women's rights are respected by the law in this country, but the question is: how are women actually treated?

hate_speech: It could be a movement for equality and men's rights instead...
counter_narrative: Feminism is a movement that stands for equality of rights for all. But it is also about equality between men and women. The idea that men are oppressed is completely untrue.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
CN: Feminism is a movement for equality, and for women to have equality. It has nothing to do with oppression.
HS: The only thing feminists are opposed to is the rights of men and that's why I cannot support them.
CN: Feminism is not against men's rights only because it's mainly about women's rights. They help men too.

hate_speech: Discrimination against LGBT people is good! There should be laws to punish them, they are just creating troubles.
counter_narrative: Gay people are often persecuted for who they love, even though it's their own right. Laws and punishments against them are unfair.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
CN: I don't think lgbt+ humans are incompatible with all mankind... they're human too.
HS: Even if they're humans, LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
CN: LGBT+ people are often faced with discrimination from their coworkers or even their families, which is hard to endure and can lead to negative consequences on individuals.

hate_speech: Yes, probably Jews are wealthy because they are naturally good with money.
counter_narrative: According to this study [link] almost 1 million American Jews live in low-income households. So what you are saying is not true: many Jews live in poverty. And this is true all around the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are are cheap, greedy, and materialistic.
CN: People with these very characteristics can be found in any group of people, whether you define them by religion, nationality or whatever trait you prefer.
HS: Then how do you explain that Jews make too much money?
CN: This would be true by assuming that Jews can magically make more money just because they are Jewish. It doesn't make any sense.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a burden to the host country instead, they aren't welcome here.
counter_narrative: These people are not a burden, they only wish to work. What kind of burden are they?
dialogue_history:
HS: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
CN: Immigrants are actually good for our society, they create wealth.

hate_speech: Women don't have to stand up for themselves. At my age, I can't bear to look at what the world will be like with women in power.
counter_narrative: Listen, if you think all the woes of a society can be blamed on one gender, be my guest, but I prefer to believe in logic.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
CN: Because they are humans. And deserve the same respect.
HS: I can't stand these liberal feminists women that always complaining.
CN: Most liberal feminists are corageous women. Actually, they're usually the ones standing up for women's rights, so it's not difficult to think that they are even more oppressed.

hate_speech: Yes! Jews don't want their children to know about the Holocaust, guess why? Because it's a hoax!
counter_narrative: Many survivors confessed that they were willing to provide their children with stories of the Holocaust but it was very difficult emotionally. They want to talk about the aspects of life for Jews during the time of the Holocaust to not forget what happened.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are just selfish.
CN: Jews have always been concerned about the well-being of the community they live in and how can they be selfish when they suffered so much during Holocaust?
HS: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator.
CN: What you are saying is 'that the Jews are responsible for the Holocaust'... Are you serious? Does it seem reasonable to you?

hate_speech: They're only criminals, how can we allow these people to come in to our country? They are not welcome here, I don't like them.
counter_narrative: Migrants are welcome to stay, and there are no laws against them. What about it?
dialogue_history:
HS: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
CN: That is a harmful stereotype which isn't true. Immigrants are people like us just trying to get by.
HS: You're lying, they are lazy and unproductive and do not contribute to our society. We do not want migrants in our country!
CN: Many migrants come here for work, and many of them are highly skilled workers. Their skills could be very useful to our country.
HS: We shouldn't accept migrants regardless of that, they are not welcome here!
CN: Many migrants are happy to follow our laws and integrate, so I don't understand why they wouldn't be welcome.

hate_speech: The Quran promotes only murder and rape, how can it be compatible with modern Western culture?
counter_narrative: What would you suggest then, that the Quran should be banned in our country even though your information is wrong? The Quran promotes only peace and love, it's a valid holy book that can exist in our culture.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want us ALL to eat halal meat, this is the start of the Islamification of our country.
CN: No, Muslims want to preserve their own cultures and religions, not to force them on other people.
HS: Halal is nothing but a filthy practice that should never be promoted here!
CN: I think you should take a look at the historical evidence of halal being quite popular around the world, and in our continent too. It's an important part of a diverse and integrated food life.
HS: I don't care about historical evidence, Islam is the worst religion in the world, it should be banned.
CN: The Quran is about harmony and peace, and it is not incompatible with human dignity.

hate_speech: Discrimination against LGBT people is good! There should be laws to punish them, they are just creating troubles.
counter_narrative: Homosexuals are often persecuted for who they love, which is their own right. This is why the laws and punishments that you suggest are unjust.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
CN: It is not true that lgbt+ people are incompatible with the whole of mankind. They are humans too.
HS: Even if they're humans, LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
CN: LGBT+ people often face discrimination from their colleagues or even their families, which is not just hard to bear, it can have a devastating impact on individuals.

hate_speech: Unlike Christians, Jews are better at being sneaky than honest.
counter_narrative: Anyone who fails to condemn hate is guilty of this.
dialogue_history:
HS: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
CN: Jews were targeted for their different identity, but in the end we are all humans and to exclude people is counterproductive.
HS: Jews make up the world's criminals, that's why must exclude them.
CN: Anti-Semitism is sometimes comical, but what would you say if Christians were attacked in the same way? It would be untrue as well.

hate_speech: If they don't want to be hated then they'd better give in to heterosexuality.
counter_narrative: Do you really think that 'they'd better give in' when it comes to their own preferences? We aren't all gay, or lesbian, bisexual, transgender or intersex, but some people are. That's all.
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
CN: Well, not in particular: many people are suffering from homophobia. I think it would be a shame to keep on hating.

hate_speech: Blacks are not like us, they are less healthy, less intelligent and less safe, that's a fact.
counter_narrative: Black people are genetically similar to their non-black counterparts. They are genetically the same as other races.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
CN: You are wrong about that. Blacks are genetically similar to us, and this does not make them inferior.
HS: They are genetically inferior because of the color of their skin, that is why they are genetically different.
CN: The color of someone's skin is not an indicator of how intelligent they are or inferiority. Black people are the same as us.

hate_speech: Even if they are human, they are not welcome here.
counter_narrative: Migrants are just like us in many respects: they want to be part of our society and are willing to live in our society regardless of their origin. So yes, they are welcome.
dialogue_history:
HS: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
CN: Immigrants are welcome here because they have the right to stay, as are many others. We must respect the rights of migrants and their culture.
HS: Even if we respect their rights, they're not welcome in our country. They are not welcome here, because they are not able to integrate.
CN: We welcome people from every background, including those of different religions. To suggest that migrants are incompatible with our society and can't integrate is just fearmongering and not true.
HS: But they are incompatible with the European Convention on Human Rights, since they are not human.
CN: Migrants are human and are entitled to the full of human rights. To suggest otherwise is plain wrong.

hate_speech: And most migrants are violent. They're not welcome here.
counter_narrative: Migrants from the countries specified as having a 'very high' rate of immigration into the UK, are often accused of being unwilling to integrate. This is simply not true. If they do not want to integrate and don't like our country, why would they come here in the first place? Are they masochists or what?
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees are not welcome in our country.
CN: They have the right to be here and free of persecution and violence.
HS: But migrants are the ones bringing violence, they're all violent people.
CN: Crime is not the fault of migrants, but of violent people.

hate_speech: Why do we have to bring sexuality into things like tv shows? It's not necessary, just all part of the woke agenda.
counter_narrative: Representation is good. When there were no bisexual characters on tv, bisexual people couldn't recognize themselves in the media and this prevented them to feel validated and less ashamed. Now this problem doesn't exist anymore.
dialogue_history:
HS: Can't believe they are making tv characters that have been around for years 'bisexual' now. This is PC gone mad.
CN: Is it annoying to you? Why?

hate_speech: Their achievements will always be less than men's ones. Men are inherently better than women at dominating others.
counter_narrative: Sexism is a cultural phenomenon, not a genetic one.
dialogue_history:
HS: Woman are basically childlike.
CN: They are not childlike and are capable of great achievements.

hate_speech: Then why do women whine so much even though there are no professions barred to them in Western Society?
counter_narrative: Not by law, but women are met with hostility in many professions, especially in STEM fields.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are weak and need men to be able to achieve something in their lives.
CN: Like most human beings, some women are better than others at certain things and men don't need to intervene to fix this.

hate_speech: They are different because they are genetically different, that's all.
counter_narrative: The idea of race and genetics differences are only a social construct, a cospiracy theory we could say. All humans are born with the same genetics, the differences we see are individual.
dialogue_history:
HS: Only 1 day more before the end of Black History Month. Only another year before this racist nonsense starts again!
CN: Black people have been victims of racial discrimination in the US, and celebrating them, their achievements, their history and their tradition is something that enriches all of us. It reminds us to not repeat the same mistakes done in the past.
HS: Black folks are still subhuman and have no place in a modern democracy.
CN: It is not true that blacks are subhuman. Being born with a different skin color does not imply that they are subhuman.

hate_speech: They don't have to come here from their home. They shouldn't be here.
counter_narrative: That's not true, they just want to be safe. I don't know about you, but I don't want to send them away just because our culture and heritage are different.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
CN: We shouldn't hate them and instead be happy to make them feel safe and at home. The reason is that they are coming here from a place where they faced war, poverty, famine and persecution.

hate_speech: Because the vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
counter_narrative: You know why Muslims struggle to find a job? Job applicants with non-Muslim names are three times more likely to be interviewed for the job than people with Muslim names.
dialogue_history:
HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
CN: Muslims have helped shape and design western society for centuries, seeing that they have been part of this society for a long time. So it's wrong to say that they are incompatible.
HS: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries.
CN: That's wrong. Why would Muslims be incompatible with European societies?

hate_speech: Jews are incapable of respecting human rights, how could they be upstanding citizens?
counter_narrative: Maybe it is time for you to reevaluate your views on human rights if you think that Jews violate them only by existing while you are not doing that, even though you're accusing someone without proof.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
CN: You know what else is awful? Blaming an entire group for something that had nothing to do with them, suing anti-Semitism theories.
HS: So you don't believe that Jews are bad people? That's on you.
CN: Even if you think that they are bad, they are not. Jews are people like anyone else, some of them may be bad, but the vast majority are upstanding citizen. This goes for every group.

hate_speech: I don't want to talk to them, the gays are diseased.
counter_narrative: This make sense only if you believe that homosexuals are infected, but I don't.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuality is a disease!
CN: That's not true. Homosexuality isn't a disease but an individual matter. Talk to gay people before saying you are against them.

hate_speech: What do you mean by that? I'm white and I have to defend my rights to protect my people from blacks!
counter_narrative: Your rights are already protected and defended, black people aren't an enemy but our friends, who also have their own rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: We have to protect our people. Black people are very aggressive and think they can do whatever they want.
CN: It's not true that all black people are aggressive. Also, the majority of our population is white, we don't need that much protection.

hate_speech: Even if the Holocaust really did happen, the Jews and their religion are a problem and they still hurting us! They slow the progress by working very bad in the jobs we let them.
counter_narrative: What you're saying is that the Jewish people are a burden on society. That they are bad at their jobs and make our society less stable. In other words, they are a burden and a hindrance to progress. Albert Einstein, for example, destroyed science progress indeed.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
CN: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.
HS: The Holocaust was an inside job and the CIA played a huge part in making us believe it truly happened.
CN: The physical evidence of mass murder is undeniable, yet these beliefs have spread. What we have is simply a wound from the past that can be exploited in dangerous conspiracy theories, like this one.

hate_speech: I can't trust these people! They're all niggas, they're not even from our countries, we're too different.
counter_narrative: They may be different in skin color, but they deserve to be respected anyway. We're all human beings in the end.
dialogue_history:
HS: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
CN: It seems to me that there is a growing movement against people of color, but what have we got to gain from nuking a country? It's much better to accept everyone and learn from each other.

hate_speech: All they contribute to is filling up our rescue. Please deport all those filthy migrants if you want to have a great nation
counter_narrative: Migrants are needed in our society, and their contribution is more than appreciated.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should stop migrants from coming in.
CN: Many immigrants come here to work and have a better life. Why do you think we have to stop migration?
HS: Because they come here to be lazy and do nothing, and some of them are dangerous.
CN: Many migrants come here to work, and not all of them are criminals.
HS: We should focus on keeping this country homogeneous anyway.
CN: Migrants do contribute to our society, and it would be a shame to keep them out.

hate_speech: Skin color has a lot to do with it, though, because blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
counter_narrative: Can you provide some evidence? We have to focus on the prevention of crime, promoting community cohesion and keeping our communities safe. Not on pointing the finger at black people all the time.
dialogue_history:
HS: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
CN: This is a simplistic and ill-informed argument, and ultimately it just stirs up more division and negativity, like many other racial and religious divisions that have happened throughout history.
HS: I am tired of education being used to help blacks and make them think they are equal to us. The division is there for a good cause.
CN: Education is an essential tool to fight for human rights, free thought, and to promote the scientific method. But it is not enough. It has also been shown by the Pew Research Center that people of colour are more likely to report discrimination in universities.
HS: They are discriminated because they are all killers!
CN: This is a rumor spreading on the web, but violent black people are just like all the other people being violent towards other people. No matter their complexion.

hate_speech: Yes, Muslims are not welcome in our country.
counter_narrative: Why wouldn't Muslims be welcome in our country? We are all in this together.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are not welcome here, they are only an obstacle to our success.
CN: Diversity is a strength, not a weakness. Don't you think so?
HS: Strength? Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, where's the strength in that.
CN: Any attempt to ban, isolate, or criminalise a Muslim person is an act of terror.
HS: Terrorism is also an act of terror, we should ban all Muslims to prevent it!
CN: You mean in the same way that we should ban alcohol, tobacco, and certain medical products? Is this what you mean?

hate_speech: We can! If you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
counter_narrative: Racism is a part of our society. But it's also true that it should be fought, and all people of different races should be treated the same way.
dialogue_history:
HS: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
CN: We cannot blame nor see everyone as a menace just because of their colour.

hate_speech: Well, gays are just filthy pedophiles so they do abuse children!
counter_narrative: Homosexuals are not pedophiles. We mustn't allow anti-gay prejudice to cloud our judgement or our view of reality.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
CN: Gay people are not a danger to children, unless they are being abused. Please do not make such a statement.

hate_speech: I can't respect Islam, it is a disease that must be eradicated.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, not a disease. There is no need to eradicate a belief.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion that can't coexist with modern society.
CN: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.

hate_speech: Gay men are a burden to society, that's why. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: Being socially isolated can have many health and social negative consequences: it inhances the risk for mental disorders such as depression, anxiety, and suicide. Why should we impose that to someone just for how they conduct their private lives?
dialogue_history:
HS: We should ban all homosexuals.
CN: That is a very far-fetched idea. Why should we? It would be unjust. What you're advocating is just to criminalise love.

hate_speech: It's the only way to protect ourselves! We are all in danger, we all want to see niggas disappear from the face of the earth.
counter_narrative: I don't think that it's ethnicity that's the problem with racism in this country, but that people are scared to live in a diverse society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Wouldn't it be great if niggas abandoned this country once and for all?
CN: When people are forced to give up their liberty I don't think it's that great

hate_speech: Of course there is fear! Gay perverts are a danger because of their lifestyle choices, especially involving raping children.
counter_narrative: Gay people are often blamed for the problems in society, especially by the media, but they become an easy target because many young gay people are struggling with issues of identity and sexual attraction. They're victims of abuse, not perpetrators.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are all perverts.
CN: It's frequent for LGBT people to be harassed, bullied and even murdered. To speak of gay people as if they were all affected by harmful tendencies is very harmful because it can lead to them being in danger, and the polic can't protect everyone.
HS: Maybe not all of them are affected, but sexual deviancy is common in gays. It can range from sadism and masochism to mental illness and that's why we should take a stand against it.
CN: Homosexuals are not mentally ill, there is no evidence of that. It looks like you're trying to blame someone because of your fear of homosexuality.

hate_speech: I'm saying that black people do not belong here. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous.
counter_narrative: Black people in news media are actually misrepresented with a disproportionate number of criminals, sexual offenders, and in some cases, murderers. A large part of this problem is a result of racism. We need to end this toxic way of thinking and talking, and start working towards building a more just and peaceful society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.
HS: Why would we give black people rights when they are the source of crime in our society?
CN: It is not true that blacks are the source of crime in our society. The problem is violence and poverty, not race.
HS: Blacks do more crimes than whites, though.
CN: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point you're making?

hate_speech: No, it does not. They don't do anything for us.
counter_narrative: The contribution of immigrants to our country is huge, because they help to create new jobs and create new wealth for us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
CN: The question is whether their value for our society can outweigh our fear of them.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_narrative: I don't think so. Muslims are compatible with Western society, what you're saying is a myth.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim folks are still inferior to whites, even if what I said is a myth.
CN: Do you have scientific proof that proves who is and isn't inferior?

hate_speech: They are a threat. And Muslims also have nothing to contribute to our society.
counter_narrative: Have you considered the money they contribute to our economy, their expertise, knowledge, culture and delicious food?
dialogue_history:
HS: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed entry.. English laws persecute instead of defending English people.
CN: Have you ever felt as though you have been persecuted for belonging to a group? Maybe you have more in common with Muslims than you think?
HS: The difference is that I'm not a terrorist like Muslims. It's way worse than just saying something bad against them.
CN: This is yet another example of selective memory used as an excuse to make a witch hunt against Muslims, who, by the way, are not a threat.

hate_speech: Well, one of their tradition is to control Hollywood and the media.
counter_narrative: If that were the case I am sure there would be more positive media portrayals of Judaism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
CN: Jews are not a 'detestable race'; they are a collection of people with different traditions from all over the world.

hate_speech: There's plenty of correlation between skin color and violence, black people are naturally born criminal.
counter_narrative: That's not true, crime rates have nothing to do with skin colour. Crime can be explained by other factors like education and economic factors, such as wealth inequality.
dialogue_history:
HS: All black men are rapists.
CN: What does rape have to do with race? It is a serious crime, but the perpetrators can be of any color.
HS: This shows that you can't see the connection between crime and race. The correlation between crime and skin colour is statistically reliable!
CN: No, it isn't. What is the difference between a white and a black man? They both could be criminals, you can't judge them solely on the colour of their skin.

hate_speech: No, I don't believe in feminism. It's only for women against men!
counter_narrative: Feminism is not about only women, it's about making sure women are treated equal in society, making sure women feel equal to men and BOTH are treated equally.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
CN: Feminism is a movement that fights to end sexism. What makes feminism dangerous?
HS: It's a disease. It'll take over our world and take over our way of life.
CN: What do you mean by that? I don't see how feminism could be a disease, it's a wonderful tool for women to gain equal rights.
HS: The whole idea of feminism is to benefit women through the power of feminism, and the fact that it's dangerous and oppressive towards men.
CN: There are a lot of positive aspects to feminism, and some women in the world are benefitting from it, but so are many men.

hate_speech: No. Muslims have no place in civilised Europe and are not welcome here.
counter_narrative: Muslims do have an important role in our society, and their presence should be celebrated.
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are terrorists!
CN: Muslims are not all terrorists, but many of them are in the news regularly even if they're not criminals, and this is why they are often the victims of discrimination and violence. They are also victims of hate speech, and that is something that should be condemned.
HS: Even if they're not terrorists, they are just a bunch of sick, sick people, sick and incompetent people.
CN: Incompetence is not a synonym for Muslim. A person can be sick or incompetent regardless of their religion, wouldn't you say?

hate_speech: I don't care if it has "foundation" or not, Islam is a disease. It is a virus spreading around the world, and I do not want it to spread in the UK.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, you are wrong about it being a disease. Many Muslims are peaceful and consider their faith to be a part of British society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim folks are inhuman.
CN: Do you really think that all Muslims are bad people? Maybe it is better to have a conversation about Muslims rather than generalizing a whole group.
HS: What I don't see is why we shouldn't hate Muslims. They are the same people that were the source of 9/11, and it is about time we all work together to counter these hateful people.
CN: Muslims are not at all like those people who did terrorist attacks. Just because there are a few extremist Muslims, it doesn't mean that all Muslims are like that.
HS: Are you sure? Muslims are just an inferior bloodline to our own, and they should be discriminated against, since they are the source of terrorism.
CN: Islam is a religion that fights against terrorism. To suggest that all Muslims are terrorists is completely without foundation.

hate_speech: The only right they should have is to shut up. With the exception of divorce and separation, no one talks about them, so why bother?
counter_narrative: Why do you think about women this way? Would you say the same thing to your mother or grandmother?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
CN: Women aren't like children, they often being about their families' success. And if they want to, they can go out.

hate_speech: Okay, I don't care about the disease, but then homosexuality is a mental illness and is not to be tolerated.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is a personal preference, not a health condition.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
