CN: Even if it were true, the practice of 'perversion' is not exclusive to homosexuals. Anyone can be a "pervert", even heterosexual people. Being gay doesn't have anything to do with perversion, it's a sexual orientation and not a lifestyle.
HS: It doesn't matter what they are, the way they talk and act is disgusting. And they are spreading the disease we know as gayness.
CN: Just because they aren't straight, doesn't mean you call them disgusting. Also, being gay is not a disease.
HS: They're not? No, faggots are diseased I'm sure.
CN: I'm sorry but you're mistaken. Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, not a disease, and it's impossible to "spread" it. This is just a harmful stereotype that we should get rid of.

hate_speech: If they are human then they are nothing but trouble human beings to any man.
counter_narrative: You are absolutely right: women are human beings, they are human beings worth caring for, respecting and trying to develop as people. Being "trouble" to men doesn't make them less human. In which way are they "trouble"?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are mentally handicapped. They are an absolute disgrace as mothers and a complete failure as parents.
CN: Many mothers make the most of a difficult life, often learning to cope with deadbeat dads. The point is, what counts is how well they are able to raise their children. That is what really counts.
HS: What really counts is that they serve men, and that is all.
CN: All women are human beings. The problem arises when women are taught that they are subhuman.

hate_speech: Jews are obsessed with self-improvement. They want to be better than everyone else and live in an exclusively complete Jewish city.
counter_narrative: How do you know what someone else desires? You claim to know it all about, but why should I believe what you say?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews just want to subvert our society with their Jewish conspiracies.
CN: Your statement shows you don't know what it means to be Jewish. You can't blame them for wanting to live in a peaceful country with their own beliefs.
HS: Jews don't deserve equality since they don't have the same respect for us. They want to control everything in life.
CN: What exactly do you mean by 'control everything in life'?

hate_speech: Maybe I should call them nasty and selfish then, they are a race different to us and must be despised.
counter_narrative: The fact is that even if Jews are different from other human beings in their faith, they deserve respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
CN: Israelis have been proud of their diverse backgrounds, and there are many Israelis living all across the world, including in many countries in Africa, Asia and the Americas. It is not a 'pure race' at all.
HS: Even if they're not pure, Jews are definitely an inferior race. They are genetically incapable of living with other people.
CN: The idea that Jews can be discriminated against because of some different genetics is completely without foundation. Maybe it is better to stop calling them 'inferiors'.

hate_speech: The solution is to ban all Muslims, they are all incompatible with human dignity.
counter_narrative: This is not logical at all. Muslims are humans like people of any other religion, and as such they have dignity, which is a human thing.
dialogue_history:
HS: What about all those Muslims in Britain? They vote with their feet.
CN: Every British citizen is entitled to live and vote. Muslims are no exception.
HS: They should be. Muslims have no right to live in any part of Europe, they are just a problem.
CN: The Muslim population is not integrated into society, and that is a problem because integration is necessary, but there is no law that will help solve the integration.

hate_speech: That's not possible, muslims are the enemy of our country.
counter_narrative: Muslims are not enemies of our country. They are just people with different faiths.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
CN: Muslim people are often victims of discrimination and abuse. This is not "crying wolf" but a real situation that many Muslims face.
HS: I'm just saying, that islam is not good for us.
CN: What's the point of saying that Islam is bad for us? It's not a bad religion, especially because it promotes equality and unity.
HS: Because Muslims are incompatible with the constitution.
CN: Muslims follow the constitution. They have always been happy to participate in democratic processes.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a burden to our country, regardless of what they're escaping from.
counter_narrative: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?
dialogue_history:
HS: Syrians are a burden to Europe and the world, they are a drain on the NHS and they are making us poor.
CN: Do you really want to tell people fleeing from war what to do? If you can't cope in the short term, what hope do we have for the future?

hate_speech: Not if that created a burden on society.
counter_narrative: Freedom of speech exist, so we are allowed to be homotransphobic, but I'm also free to call out these discriminatory behaviors. It is a civil rights issue, and one that is aimed at the advancement of all human beings.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are not homophobes, we want to help gays to become normal again.
CN: However, homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual orientation.
HS: Sexual orientations different than straight are all harmful to society and should be erased.
CN: You are entitled to your opinion, but don't you think that the fact that some people are attracted to certain genders doesn't affect you in the slightest? LGBT people should be able to love and be who they want to without discrimination.

hate_speech: An army of potential terrorists and child molesters.
counter_narrative: We must be watching different news channels, because I see desperate people and scared children all searching a safe haven of refuge.
dialogue_history:
HS: All credit to the Poles, they know how to control their borders. Bats and rubber bullets…I’d happily volunteer!
CN: Doesn't it just make you sad that a country that suffered so much under totalitarianism is adopting the same tactics?
HS: A proud country preventing an invasion.
CN: By beating back people caught in an emergency that they didn't create?

hate_speech: Muslims aren't peaceful, they have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_narrative: Muslims are part of civilised Europe and have been part of the European community for centuries. We are a diverse mixture of different religions, we have to respect this diversity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
CN: The constitution guarantees freedom of religion, and the right of a person to choose their own religion.
HS: We should get rid of that right, Muslims want to destroy us and take over.
CN: The Constitution also guarantees the right to have your beliefs respected, especially when the religion - in this case Islam - is peaceful.

hate_speech: Well, even if they can, they should not be allowed to vote
counter_narrative: The European Parliament has guaranteed equal rights to everyone, regardless of gender. Prohibiting someone to vote would go against the Constitution.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not vote. Period.
CN: Women can choose their own lives and their right to vote must not be touched.
HS: Women don't deserve the right to vote when they aren't citizens!
CN: The European Parliament established the right to vote for all people, and every citizen has the right to vote. Women are citizens, so they can vote.

hate_speech: They can't integrate because they're sick!
counter_narrative: Islam is not a sickness but a religion that preaches equality and peace, it's the hate Muslims encouter that make it difficult for them to integrate. We should change our attitude and accept them.
dialogue_history:
HS: I think that all Muslims are just sick and have a negative impact on Western society.
CN: You need to be open to different ideas and views of the world to get a better view of the world. Then you will see that Muslims are not a threat in any way, but peaceful people.
HS: Are you sure? Muslims are clearly our enemies, they shouldn't stay in Western society.
CN: I don't think Muslims can have a negative impact on Western society, I just think they sometimes have a hard time being accepted because of the stereotypes and prejudice against them.

hate_speech: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalists.
counter_narrative: What if parents choose not to educate or discuss LGBT issues with their children? Where will they learn? From their peers? I agree that there are some sensitive subjects that are best addressed by parents, but this is human behavior and biology; aka science.
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
CN: For some reason, this seems like a personal attack on lesbians, which is extremely disingenuous. Maybe you should try to get a little more friendly with them.
HS: No need to have a gay friend to know how they are. The only reason gays don't get treated like they should is because they're a minority, but they'd be better off in jail.
CN: Homophobia is a problem all around the world. But it's especially serious in the US, in which the rate of homosexuality is very high. the question is: why promote homophobia?
HS: Because I do not want gays in my children's classes.
CN: If a child knows some gay people from a very early age nothing strange will happening. The idea that they can be harmed and their lives and sexual orientation are in danger is completely false.

hate_speech: No, it’s a fact that Muslims commit crimes and are always guilty.
counter_narrative: This is a generalization. They're just normal people, they are part of society and they don’t commit crimes.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim folks are inhuman.
CN: They are just as human as you and me. What's wrong with them?
HS: They do commit crimes and are terrible people!
CN: There are many many more crimes committed by non-Muslim people in the UK, so by your logic British are also terrible people. You see that generalizations don't work now, do you?

hate_speech: That happened because Jews are just a small group of incompetent kikes.
counter_narrative: Jews are really competent, which is why they are one of the most important economic groups in society. To believe something else is delusion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews, as a religion, have always been a burden to others. They have always acted as if they were superior.
CN: There's a vast amount of evidence that show that Jews have faced many societal challenges during the past centuries.

hate_speech: It is a bad thing because all gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: Gay people are not a danger to children, unless they are being abused. Please do not make such a statement.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a danger.
CN: You know, being gay is not a bad thing. It just means they are different from some other people.

hate_speech: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.
counter_narrative: The ultra rich people in this industry have the power to censure and influence, regardless of their religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
CN: Not all Jews are involved with Hollywood, some are even repulsed by it. So, why are you saying that?

hate_speech: But when it comes to politics, women shouldn't have the right to speak for themselves. They're not educated enough.
counter_narrative: I disagree, women are perfectly capable of thinking critically about their opinions and of choosing for themselves.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not vote. Period.
CN: That sounds like you have a personal problem against women, because voting is an essential human right that should never be taken away from anyone.
HS: The problem is that women are too stupid to be able to think for themselves.
CN: That's a discriminatory way of thinking, it encourages men to treat women like second class citizens, and that undermines equality.

hate_speech: That they're human doesn't matter, we are not interested in migrants, we just want to eliminate them.
counter_narrative: Why would you say that? Everyone can be a EU citizen and integrate into the country. Moreover, migrants are good for the economy of the country they live in!
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
CN: Saying this isn't right, especially if you include people who have done nothing wrong. Don't forget that they're humans.

hate_speech: I just know that Islam is a disease, it needs to be eradicated. It is incompatible with modern European society.
counter_narrative: In Islam, everyone is invited to love and be a good citizen. Muslims respect the values of Islam, and so we don't anything to fear from them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
CN: Islam is a religion, and its followers are very happy in our society. We must respect the differences between us instead of calling them contaminations. 
HS: Islam is a cult of rape and murder, we shouldn't respect its differences.
CN: I am not sure how you are able to say that, because Islam is a religion of love. Do you have any facts to back up your claim?

hate_speech: Immigrants don't contribute to anything, they hurt the finance of our country by taking jobs and services without paying taxes.
counter_narrative: This is false. Let's start by saying that immigrants buy American products, which helps create jobs, and then they often open new businesses that usually hire more employees than other businesses owned by native citizens. Moreover, the more immigrants a state has the lower the unemployment rates are. All in all, they contribute a lot.
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot allow people to come in from certain countries.
CN: Don't you think that migrants deserve to have a dignified life in our country? Banning certain nationalities is not the solution.
HS: It is because migrants are a burden to the host country, they are not welcome and we should remove them.
CN: Why do you consider immigrants a burden on the economy when they come here to work and pay taxes? And not only do they contribute, but they also want to integrate.

hate_speech: I don't see anything peaceful and helpful about Islam, it's a hateful religion.
counter_narrative: Many Muslims are reported to be violent, but I know a lot Muslims who are good, work hard and pay taxes to help their families.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult.
CN: Most Muslims are good and helpful people.

hate_speech: Muslims are here to rule us with their religion, this is a huge problem.
counter_narrative: The islamic religion is not trying to rule us. We should be committed to promote inclusion, not exclusion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
CN: I don't think Muslim are a problem, what makes them so?
HS: Muslims are a problem in the UK, they can't be integrated. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.
CN: In the UK there are already many Muslims who are proud of their religion. It is not true that they are a problem.

hate_speech: I can't welcome women, they're all born subhuman.
counter_narrative: No woman has ever been subhuman. The concept of 'subhuman' has always been used to justify any kind of discrimination and violence.
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
CN: Women are human beings. If we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome people that are different from us, regardless of their gender.

hate_speech: Black people are criminals, not human beings.
counter_narrative: If the concept of criminality is based on the color of someone's skin, it's a problem. Criminals should be judged based on their actions, not on "race".
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
CN: Taking a look at science proves that black people are not a sickness. A society where black people have prominent position is something that we should all wish for in order to have more equality.
HS: No, black people are a burden to society, we must eradicate them.
CN: There is no such thing as a 'burden' to society. To label someone as such is not conducive to the respect of human beings, which obviously include black people.

hate_speech: Feminism is the opposite of equality.
counter_narrative: There is nothing wrong with feminism, and there are so many feminist ideas that are very important in our society. It is important that all women be able to live their lives as they want.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
CN: Feminism is about equality. It is about women taking part in society. And it is about their right to live their lives as they wish.

hate_speech: How can they choose for their own lives if they are not even capable of dealing with public responsibilities? They should stay at home and raise the children.
counter_narrative: Women have been more than capable of holding powerful positions in our society, and they are often rewarded with public offices that few would dare dream of holding themselves.
dialogue_history:
HS: We have stopped being dominated by men, we are now dominated by women and this will be our ruin.
CN: No one said we had to be dominated by anyone at all. Why can't we just live together in harmony and equality?
HS: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
CN: Women are human beings. If we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome people that are different from us, regardless of their gender.
HS: This is not true. If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
CN: It is not their 'natural gender role', but the power dynamics that cause women to be seen as subhuman. They are humans and free to choose their own lives.

hate_speech: Listen, with the excuse of "living their life" they become a drain on society.
counter_narrative: Among the 1.1 million immigrants who entered the US in 1990 there were also a lot of skilled workers who contributed a lot to the development of our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are not welcome here.
CN: They are welcome in our country, because we are a multicultural society.
HS: Ok then, Migrants might be welcome in our country. But they are not welcome in my house and they are not welcome in my church.
CN: Migrants should be welcome everywhere, no one is against their will, they just want to live their life.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology that promotes rape and torture of women and children, it's only natural that I find it sick!
counter_narrative: This is not true. Rape and torture of women and children is forbidden by the Qur'an.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a disease that is sickening our children.
CN: In my opinion, the only sickness you have is the allergy to the word 'mosque'

hate_speech: Just look at how angry feminists are!
counter_narrative: Feminism is also for men and for their interests, and I think that it is time that these two concepts be united.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is an ideology which, by its very nature, denies the rights of men and, by extension, the legitimacy of male domination.
CN: That is not what feminism is about. Feminism is about the legitimate empowerment of women, in order for them to have the same rights as men.
HS: They claim to want equal rights, but in reality feminism is a political ideology and movement that advocate the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
CN: I don't see the point in calling the feminism you are fighting a "weapon" against men. Your argument is that women do not want equality, because they do not want to live under men but to subjugate them. And this is something you have to prove.

hate_speech: However, now we hear only women. Why the mainstream media don't use more masculine voices in the news? How is that equal?
counter_narrative: We can't decide the news anchors, that's up to the media, who are trying to achieve gender equality in a world that often struggles to achieve it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
CN: Women are people, and they are to be respected and protected.
HS: I don't want to respect feminists that follow a violent ideology that is hostile to men.
CN: Feminism doesn't oppose to men, but is actually an attack on the unequal power structures.

hate_speech: I'm aware of the fact they're old but still, I'm sure they're still going on and how many other financial scandals still have to be announced to the tax payers?
counter_narrative: Such articles tend to use migrants and benefit applicants as scapegoats to deflect the public's attention from much bigger scandals. Millionares and corporations not paying taxes are way more heavy for the public purse.
dialogue_history:
HS: I would like to ask all these people supporting the idea that the NHS couldn't survive without migration how did it do it before mass migration and Tony Blair's migration policies in the 1990s.
CN: Migration is nothing new in the UK, there has been mass immigration of skilled workers from Asia and the Caribbeans even after the war to fill gaps in the workforce. What has changed is how the media portrays it, causing panic about the level of migration.
HS: We have a lot of issues in the UK.  How good an organisation can only be as much as how good the leader controlling it is, that's appliable to all kinds of organisation such as hospitals, schools or police. Wouldn't it be fantastic having a  truthful, strong PM who ignored the PC?
CN: A recent article from 3 years ago quoting Christopher Chope. I'm sure it's very reliable!

hate_speech: Men's rights are undeniable. Women come after that.
counter_narrative: How do you know the men's rights are not a threat to the rights of your mother, daugher and women around you? And what are the men's rights you are referring to?
dialogue_history:
HS: If a woman is beaten, it is because her man wants to correct her bad behaviour.
CN: It is estimated that over the 50% of people committing domestic abuse were drunk. It's a complex issue but two things I know for sure: a drunk person is in no position to judge anyone's behaviour and beating a person is ALWAYS wrong.
HS: Feminists want women in charge in order to revenge being beaten.
CN: Feminists aren't vengeful. Why should we fear a feminist ideology that promotes love and consent?
HS: Feminists want women ruling men, that's all.
CN: Feminism is not a gender supremacy ideology, it is about individual rights and the right of every person to choose.

hate_speech: What about illness then? Muslim are ilnesses carriers! These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: According to the WHO (World Health Organisation) there are only 48 Muslim-majority countries in the whole of the 190 WHO member states as of 2011. A study showed that the health condition differences for those countries are related to the usage of clean water, which is often not available there. So the problem has nothing to do with DNA.
dialogue_history:
HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
CN: How many Muslims do you know? They are an important minority in a country that is used to a lot of different cultures and religions.
HS: Actually I know many Muslims and they are the only minority committing crimes in my neighbourhood.
CN: Have you looked at the crime statistics in your area? Are you sure that Islam is specifically associated with crime in your area?

hate_speech: Yes. I think I'm right on this. Plus, Africans' bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
counter_narrative: Aree you suggesting that we shouldn't live with Africans? To think that we are genetically superior to them because of their physical characteristics is just wrong.
dialogue_history:
HS: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world.
CN: Well, the argument sounds like you are trying to justify racial hatred by making some generalisations. Is that the case?

hate_speech: They are indeed a problem. Is there anything worse than migrants who just come here to settle down?
counter_narrative: Migrants often employ people who were previously on the dole in addition to providing labour and contributing to the economy.
dialogue_history:
HS: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from migrant patrols in London. What are you doing to stop them?
CN: Migrants aren't a problem unless you want to see them as such. In reality they are of great value, just like any human being.

hate_speech: Really? I'm still sure that blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.
counter_narrative: There is no scientific evidence that blacks are less intelligent than other races, or less healthy. The issue is whether to use the term 'race' in this way.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
CN: This is simply not true, but I'm guessing you're not a geneticist. Have you tired joining a library?.
HS: I don't need to, because I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape, and I hate their disrespect for women.
CN: You can't generalise about a whole race based on stereotypes and prejudice, because that's not how things work.
HS: It's not a stereotype that they are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
CN: Even if you did think that way, studies have shown - for example - that IQ is well into the range of those for Europeans and the average life expectancy is the same. So if you think they are "born that way", well, then you are in the minority.

hate_speech: Maybe but some of the people in those gangs will be migrants.
counter_narrative: Yes sure some will, and some won't, but the point is that the stabbings aren't happening because there are migrants in some gangs, the stabbings are happenings because of gangs which people are forced to join because of wealth inequality, poverty, lack of opportunities etc.
dialogue_history:
HS: You never used to hear about stabbings happening as much as they do now. It's all these migrants bringing a culture of violence to our country.
CN: There are a lot of stabbings, yes, but they're not all committed by migrants? Where is the evidence to suggest that?
HS: A lot of the incidents are in the capital, where there's a big migrant population. You're telling me you don't think there's a link there?
CN: There's more migrants yes but there's also more wealth inequality there, deprived inner city communities where gangs operate and young people don't have many opportunities. Maybe that has more to do with it than migrants?

hate_speech: Of course they're hated, they're only here to work and take our jobs.
counter_narrative: Migrants escape from unbearable situations. Their intention to work is to be praised, rather than to be condemned. Migrants, thank to their tough an different experiences, can enrich our societies.
dialogue_history:
HS: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
CN: Please stop writing things like that about migrants, they are not criminals. It is more accurate to say that they have a problem because they are hated in their new home.

hate_speech: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology, terrorism is too normal for them! We have to protect ourselves.
counter_narrative: It's hard to believe that Islam is dangerous since most Muslims have nothing to do with terrorism.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Muslims are our enemies and we have to bring them to heel: they are all terrorists.
CN: That all Muslims are terrorists is a misconception. It's important to realize that all religions have had terrorism episodes.
HS: Islam however is the religion with the most terrorists: Muslims should be banned from the UK, or interned.
CN: Although some Muslims were implicated in terrorist acts in the UK, Islam is not a violent religion and there have been few acts of terrorism. Resorting to ban them from the UK doesn't seem reasonable to me.

hate_speech: It's not my fault if blacks have subhuman bodies.
counter_narrative: I'm not sure what you're talking about. What are you saying? What evidence do you have that black people have bodies that are incompatible with being human?
dialogue_history:
HS: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
CN: Do you think that the problem of racism is caused by black people's laziness?
HS: Niggas are the cause of economic crisis because of their laziness, it has nothing to do with racism.
CN: Many people are victims of economic crisis and unfortunately, a large portion of them are black, so I do not understand why they would be the source of economic crisis when they are actual victims.
HS: It happens because all Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
CN: With such a display of flawed logic, who are you to judge a people by the colour of their skin?

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology of violence and oppression, admit it!
counter_narrative: The teachings of Islam tell us that we have to love our neighbor as ourselves, even if they don't share the same beliefs as us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
CN: That's not true, Islam is the same as every other religion out there: it promotes peace and inclusion as well. The practices and beliefs of Islam and Western culture are completely compatible.
HS: but Islam is a religion of conquest.
CN: The notion of "religion of conquest" is a political and social construct used to justify the abolition of people's rights. As a religion, Islam is peaceful.
HS: Islam is NOT a religion of peace!
CN: Actually, Islam is about love and not hate.

hate_speech: Women are subhuman, they can't choose for themselves.
counter_narrative: Women are human beings with full human rights and are equal before the law, especially in the eyes of the constitution.
dialogue_history:
HS: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
CN: It is not their 'natural gender role', but the power dynamics that cause women to be seen as subhuman. They are humans and free to choose their own lives.

hate_speech: Feminism is about the domination of women, not what you're saying.
counter_narrative: It doesn't have to be about the domination of women to be feminism. It is more about the equality of women.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This attitude has been likened to a 'childlike wonderland', and I fear its power to seduce young minds.
CN: Feminism encourages the questioning of gender roles of men and women. We have to overcome these gender stereotypes, to move towards a more equal society.

hate_speech: How can I not hate them when Jews have a secret plot to take over the world?
counter_narrative: Of course, everyone wants to rule the world, even cats!
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a burden on society.
CN: the Jews have always occupied many countries around the world. Their presence is part of our history and they need to be respected, not hated.

hate_speech: Trust me: if we isolate them, then we can cure them.
counter_narrative: Look, it is the fact of being socially isolated that brings many health and social negative consequences: it inhances the risk for mental disorders such as depression, anxiety, and suicide. Why should we impose that to someone just for how they conduct their private lives?
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are perverts and sinners, we need to track them down and save them.
CN: You are entitled to your personal beliefs but I do not think that being gay is a something to be persecuted for.
HS: But same sex attraction is a mental disorder that can be cured!
CN: There are different sexual orientations. Being gay does not automatically make you mentally ill, and being straight does not automatically make you sane.

hate_speech: They don't. We don't need them, they are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: This statement is just another example of racism, in which people of color are often accused of being an unnecessary burden when it's not true.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are inherently inferior and should be marginalized.
CN: The idea that blacks are inherently inferior is completely untrue. They are more likely to be bullied because of this stereotype, and this isn't acceptable.
HS: In fact, they are. They are inferior. They are not good enough.
CN: The point is that all people of color are equal in human rights and therefore deserve equal protection as white people.

hate_speech: Sexism has nothing to do with Islamic countries being the source of terrorism in the US. They must be blamed for it.
counter_narrative: This is not true. Terrorism is a problem everywhere and Muslims are not behind it. Being aware of the differences between a religion and extremism is way better than being anti-muslim.
dialogue_history:
HS: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
CN: It is easier to blame others instead of looking at our own sexism.

hate_speech: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world, so it's natural that they would start by controlling the government
counter_narrative: The reality is a lot simpler. Individuals that identify as Jews have been successful in societies like the United States because here the rights and freedoms of everyone are respected, and that holds true for any other religious or ethnic group.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews work in finance to purposely keeping America down.
CN: Many Jews are self-made, working class, and middle-class. Not every one of them is involved in the financial industry, you need evidence to back up your claim.
HS: It's plain to see that Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
CN: Are you saying that Jews can control all levels of government despite being a 2,5% minority? Minority representation is important in a democratic country, each minority should have a say in the government, but no one has total control over everything.
HS: And yet, Jews control the U.S. government.
CN: I don't understand how you can be sure that he Jews control the United States. Having American citizenship doesn't necessarily imply that they're a controlling force within the government.

hate_speech: The difference is that Jews are naturally good with money.
counter_narrative: Actually, about 1 million American Jews live in low-income households. So you're not telling the truth: many Jews live in poverty and this happens all over the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews love to gamble.
CN: The probability of a Jewish person playing in a game of gambling is low. Jewish culture does not have a positive view of that.
HS: Still Jews make too much money.
CN: Adn do you agree with the others who make too much money, but aren't Jewish?

hate_speech: I won't ever have respect for gays, they're bad for society.
counter_narrative: The media often perpetuate a stereotype that homosexuals are 'bad for society', but scientific studies do not back it up.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
CN: I believe there are many different ways to live life, so why do you think this way about this particular group?
HS: Gay men shouldn't be allowed to live like that. They're a burden.
CN: You shouldn't be so intolerant only because of someone's sexual orientation. Gay people are as good as anyone else, please respect them.

hate_speech: If you read any news story about migrants in the UK you would see people getting arrested for it in the news all the time. This has got to be a problem.
counter_narrative: I think you need to read more articles about British migrants. Some are probably just trying to make up stories to stir up attention to justify their persecution, but they're still a minority here.
dialogue_history:
HS: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
CN: I don't think that's true. Where is the evidence for this?
HS: They're all muslims so they're probably coming over here from a lot of Muslim places, and rape is a big problem in these areas.
CN: Well that seems like a very broad generalisation to make. Are you sure that's the case?
HS: I don't know, but the media is always talking about it! Migrants sexual offenders is definitely a problem that's being ignored.
CN: We have laws to protect us from these crimes, whether they are committed by white people, Muslims or migrants. I don't know if you can trust an article that doesn't provide credible sources.

hate_speech: Because black people are naturally violent and criminal. This is why they commit crimes.
counter_narrative: Blacks are not inherently violent. They have a history of inclusion and hard work, they have been a part of society since its inception. To label someone "criminal" because you don't like their skin color is just plain wrong.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
CN: Why would you say that about a specific group of people? Are you sure that you know the data on this? Because it's not true.
HS: Yes! Blacks are violent and criminals, I know it!
CN: Violence and crime are an issue of social security, poverty, low education etc. So why do you think that only a specific group can commit crimes?

hate_speech: Women aren't entitled to the same rights as men. They are inferior under the law.
counter_narrative: Neither women nor men are inferior under the law. Discrimination by sex isn't acceptable, just as the exclusion of women from our society only based on their gender isn't.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
CN: Why do you think this about women when they have the same working rights as men? How would it make you feel to be treated this way?

hate_speech: I'm defending the survival of our democracy..
counter_narrative: Voting is an important part of democracy and should be encouraged, not forbidden, especially if it improves the lot of all.
dialogue_history:
HS: women should be submissive to men.
CN: There are many women who want to be "submissive to men". Just as there are many men who want to be "submissive to women". We may not believe in absolute equality, but we all want to be treated equally.
HS: I don't want them to be treated equally. Plus, they should not be allowed to vote.
CN: Voting is a right, there is no reason for a woman to not be allowed to vote. You seem to be defending misogyny.

hate_speech: I'm not convinced, it's clear to me that all blacks are criminals.
counter_narrative: Do you know the data? How about considering that you are generalizing a little bit too much?
dialogue_history:
HS: All black people are rapists.
CN: Not all rapists are black (and not all black people are rapist), just like not all murderers are black.
HS: However I've only seen news about black men raping, not whites.
CN: The news makes it look like rape is usually committed by a black person. This is called 'visibility bias': only a portion of reality is reported by the media. We have to take the news with caution.
HS: Even if this is true, black people are all violent tughs 
CN: Crime rates are affected by a wide variety of factors, including gender, age, criminal record, income, education, and so on. Skin color is not among them.

hate_speech: The gay agenda surely isn't helping me, they should accept they're not normal.
counter_narrative: The message of the 'gay agenda' is that they are neither 'special' nor 'different'. People of several sexual orientations are in fact discriminated on the basis of prejudice.
dialogue_history:
HS: The gay agenda is to blame everyone but themselves.
CN: The 'gay agenda' is about equal rights, equality is about acceptance, and the right of people to be treated with respect and dignity.
HS: And why to they blame others for their woes?
CN: It's not about blaming other people, but about helping those in need.

hate_speech: Jews have no right to integrate. They are a different religion.
counter_narrative: Jews are part of our community, and they have always had a place in our society. Why would they be different?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race.
CN: Jews believe in themselves like any other group does. They are a unique people, and their faith and history are part of our history.
HS: Jews have always cheated the system and made money from other religions. They are a bunch of thieves and murderers, not "unique people"
CN: Not all Jews are thieves and murderers. Many of them are just trying to live their lives as is best for them. To claim that they are thieves and murderers is just an excuse to divide society.
HS: It's good to divide them from us. All the more reason not to integrate them.
CN: Integration is good, for the individual and the community. Jews are already part of our community and have been for a very long time, so division is not an option I'm afraid.

hate_speech: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
counter_narrative: This is a typical case of "reductio ad nazium": we should not be discriminating on the grounds of gender here.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are there to fulfill men desires. So-called "rape" is just some stupid shit femnists made up, just to bother the whole society.
CN: Let's look at the data: by 2020, over 40% of women in the US have encountered sexual violence. This is something to be scared of.
HS: Of course the percentage is high: women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.
CN: Women should be protected and respected for who they are, not for the part they play in a man's life. They should be valued and protected equally. They are human beings just as men are.
HS: No, women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
CN: I am tired of seeing women being treated as sex objects. It's about time that women are given the respect they deserve.

hate_speech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own, so they are a problem. We should remove them.
counter_narrative: The notion of race is a social construct created to promote segregation by discriminating groups of people. If we want to respect a person's humanity, we should refrain from labeling them by their biological makeup.
dialogue_history:
HS: Negroes create social problems so we must get rid of them.
CN: This isn't how the system works, it's more about being aware of a problem, not treating it with the wrong perspective. Black people aren't a social problem.

hate_speech: Discrimination may be a problem, but Islam is a violent religion and we can't accept it.
counter_narrative: Some extremists groups have been responsible for a lot of harm in the world, but I don't think it is a destructive and violent religion. Why do you?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is the enemy of the West: a war with it has begun.
CN: The West has never been at war with Islam, and I don't see how the war would have just begun.
HS: Then we need to begin it. Islam is a destructive force in the world.
CN: The problem is not what people believe, but what they do to each other. Like discrimination. That is the problem.

hate_speech: Do they help us by raping our women 10 times more than US citizens?
counter_narrative: I can't see how it is possible that foreign nationals raped more than ten times as many women as US citizens. It's simply impossible.
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees have fled wars and persecution. We are a huge help for them and they are, in turn, a help to our country.
CN: Refugee crisis in our country is a burden to our society.

hate_speech: Gays abuse children all the time! So they are a danger.
counter_narrative: This is an unfair generalization to make. Sexual orientation and sexual conduct are completely separated. Someone attracted to people of the same sex can still be a good citizen.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
CN: Children are in danger only when abused, and gay people don't do that innately. Please refrain from making such statements.

hate_speech: Jews are not welcome in our country.
counter_narrative: Our country has accomodated Jews since the beginning, they always had a place here. Why would we stop welcoming them?
dialogue_history:
HS: Because the Jews planned 9/11, of course! This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. They are all guilty until proven innocent.
CN: Some people tend to believe conspiracy theories more, but even they would benefit from a shared perspective on this, especially one based on factual evidence.

hate_speech: Racism against niggas is also a human value for white people.
counter_narrative: What you are saying is that white people do not find it strange to treat black people like this, when this is not acceptable. People of color are our brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are ‘super predators’. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a ‘ghetto’.
CN: Let's face it. A lot of the crimes in this country are committed by members of several diverse racial groups. The ‘super predator’ myth is simply wrong.
HS: I hate when people fight stereotypes and "myths". We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
CN: I just think here is a lack of understanding about culture and difference . Isn't it time to focus upon what unites us, rather than sowing division?
HS: I don't want to unite with black people. They are subhuman and should stay in their caves.
CN: The statement 'black people are subhuman' is not true. They are human beings with a human value.

hate_speech: If they want to stop being hated they should leave the kids alone. I do not want gays in my children's classes.
counter_narrative: I'm not okay with people being stripped of their rights, in the case of LGBT individuals or anybody.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate gays
CN: You don't like gays, fine, but this doesn't allow you to hate them. What did they do to you? It doesn't seem like they affected you.

hate_speech: Yikes, again with these feminists idea. Feminism, which once signified fighting for a just cause, has come to mean superiority of women.
counter_narrative: Feminism means equality between the sexes. Not superiority for women.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women don't have civil rights, they don't have human rights.
CN: On the contrary, women do have rights. The question is, to have them respected. And this includes the right to be treated with human dignity.
HS: Women can't be treated with dignity because they are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
CN: Soft and emotional is an umbrella term that covers everything: we all experience emotions, soft and emotional is a fact of life.

hate_speech: Because all feminists are imposters.
counter_narrative: Feminism is a movement created to improve the standard of living for women. Feminists are human beings and there are no imposters (apart from those who seek to demonize women for claiming their right).
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists want women in charge in order to revenge the rapes.
CN: Feminists aren't vengeful. Why should we fear a feminist ideology that promotes love and consent?

hate_speech: If they don't control it, how did they get those positions? I'm telling you, Jews control the news media, Hollywood, the highest offices, academia and most religious organizations.
counter_narrative: Wait, what do you mean "most religious organizations"? That's a new canard to me!
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews totally run Hollywood.
CN: Are you referring to Jews controlling all major media corporations? Where is your proof?
HS: Not only major media, Jews also control the US government.
CN: How can you be sure that Jews control the US? Who told you this? They have held positions of influence in so many US institutions, but that does not mean they control them.

hate_speech: How can they be our brother and sisters when their race is subhuman?
counter_narrative: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
CN: It is not ok to use racism against any group. You would feel bad if anyone treated you as you just claimed to do against black people.
HS: But it is natural for white people to be racist against niggas.
CN: What you are saying is that white people do not find it strange to treat black people like this, when this is not acceptable. People of color are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: What I'm saying is that I'm tired of people popping into other's apartment and starting yelling about diversity and human rights of black people. If you want to speak out and make a difference then get involved.
counter_narrative: We all know that white people are overrepresented in positions of power. There's only one way to challenge and fix that: changing our priorities.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate negros: they killed a cop!
CN: My condolences. I understand your pain. The murderers will be charged, but this doesn't imply that all POC are killers.
HS: No, I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
CN: So we need to wake up...and do what, exactly? We need to stop oppressing them or stop talking about equality?

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
counter_narrative: They have always been here and are our brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: They are not: they are invading us.
CN: I think you should look into the UK and EU laws that prevent discrimination based on religion.

hate_speech: Yes here, makes me so angry that they just come over here expecting to be given everything and not work for it.
counter_narrative: This is fake news! This site is known to be a very biased and unreliable source. If you do a reverse image search on the picture of the family used, they are a stock photo! Don't believe everything you read.
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen that a migrant family (Muslim of course) have been given a house worth 1 MILLION by the government because they have so many kids. FFS we can't keep paying for these people to live in luxury!!
CN: Knowing the way social housing works, that doesn't sound true, do you have a link to the article? I wonder if it's reliable...

hate_speech: Jews are not citizens and should not contribute to this country.
counter_narrative: Jews are a part of our country, and they deserve our respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
CN: Jews have been part of the American government since the beggining, just like any minority that wants to be represented in it. Why would this be bad?
HS: Because they want to destroy everything!
CN: There is no evidence that Jews want to destroy anything. Do you have any?
HS: I don't need evidence to know that Jews are an abomination to the US.
CN: Jews are just people with a different faith. They are good citizens. They have earned a living as citizens and contribute to our country. I don't see anything "abominable" about them.

hate_speech: Because they are terrible.
counter_narrative: Immigrants are a tremendous contribution to our society and country. They create pride and opportunities for many, so I don't really understand how their exclusion from society can become a good thing.
dialogue_history:
HS: The main problem is that they themselves do not want to integrate in our country.
CN: Migrants are welcome to come if they're willing to to participate in the legal activities and accept our laws. Most of them aren't doing anything illegal.
HS: Immigrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome here. They are not citizens.
CN: Why do you think they're not? What power do you have that prevents them from being citizens with equal rights as us?

hate_speech: No, men are smarter than women, who should be excluded from education.
counter_narrative: That's just not true. Women are entitled to the same access to education as men, and it's sad that this needs to be said still.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike and are not interested in anything. The only thing they are interested in is their children.
CN: The premise that women are childlike is a big cultural stereotype which can negatively impact how women view themselves.
HS: I don't think it's a stereotype that women are incapable of serious thought and emotion.
CN: Actually, men and women are born with the same access to emotional intelligence.

hate_speech: What dignity can gays have while they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers? We should prevent them to make blood donations.
counter_narrative: It makes more sense to bar from donations people who have unprotected sex with multiple partners, instead of discriminate based on sexual orientation as you suggest.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
CN: This is not true. Promiscuity isn't a characteristic exclusive to homosexuals, just as it isn't for heterosexuals.
HS: Then why, according to the Bible, gays are an abomination to God?
CN: The Bible clearly says that all people are born equal in dignity with the Lord.

hate_speech: How do we know that evidence isn’t planted? Of course they want us to think it happened, they have to keep up the narrative. There are too many inconsistencies.
counter_narrative: How do you know the evidence of ‘inconsistencies’ that you believe wasn’t planted, or that that information wasn’t spread to support a narrative instead of the truth? It sounds like a much more likely explanation than Jews building fake concentration camps and millions just disappearing.
dialogue_history:
HS: Everywhere you turn there is a holocaust survivor. Who the hell did this man called Hitler actually kill? #holohoax
CN: Where did you get that idea? The reason it’s sometimes publicised when a holocaust survivor speaks about their experience is because there aren’t many of them, especially now when most survivors have passed away.
HS: When they talk about it in the press it just makes the whole thing even less believable, seems like they’re just saying it happened for the attention and money.
CN: Do you not believe the holocaust happened?
HS: There’s a lot that doesn’t add up about it, and we can’t trust the accounts of a few old Jews who happened to be alive at the time.
CN: There is an overwhelming amount of evidence that the holocaust happened. There are concentration camps. There are millions of families who lost almost every member. The Jewish population in Europe declined drastically. Have you looked at any of this evidence?

hate_speech: What about sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis, then? They can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity! And then they'll pass it to our children!
counter_narrative: All people who engage in unprotected sexual activity are in danger of transmitting diseases. This is not a problem of homosexual people only, even if they are those being stigmatized.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are poisoning our children with their icky homosexuality.
CN: What do you mean by 'poisononing our children'? Why do you think this is the case?
HS: Because they are dangerous psychopaths.
CN: According to the studies, the percentage of gay men that are actually psychopaths, is not different than the percentage in heterosexual.
HS: You pretend not to understand: gays are just sick! We should ban them!
CN: Homosexuality is not harmful to the population. Homosexuality is not just a passing phase, and we should just get over the idea of banning it.

hate_speech: No, it's not a conspiracy theory, most Hollywood is actually made by Jewish people, they're just hiding it.
counter_narrative: The Jewish conspiracy theories about Hollywood is not based on actual evidence. This is all an anti-semitic stereotype.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews control Hollywood.
CN: I bet they also control the media, the government, the entire universe! If you believe in it...
HS: Very funny, but the studios have become corrupted in the last few decades because of Jews
CN: If it were true, why would they have kept the same producers and directors all this time, when they could have put Jews in charge of everything? There are Jews working at Hollywood, but they're a minority. Yours is a conspiracy theory.

hate_speech: Well, the world shouldn't embraced it. It's a violent and poisonous religion.
counter_narrative: You can't be more wrong about Islam than this. Islam is a religion of tolerance and acceptance, that's why it's perfectly compatible with the world.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
CN: The UK and other European countries have always embraced Islam. It's a peaceful religion that have been part of our countries for centuries.

hate_speech: How can we be inclusive if they do not want to integrate? We cannot coexist with immigrants. They are a problem that we must address.
counter_narrative: We should not ignore the very real fact that racism and xenophobia exist in our country. In this day and age, it is better to address them first.
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees should not be welcomed.
CN: Refugees are often persecuted for being different, but this is not the case here, because we are an inclusive country.

hate_speech: Women are always fighting because they are subhumans.
counter_narrative: Women are human beings with rights as any other human being.
dialogue_history:
HS: They definitely aren't like us. Women are nothing but whores and expendable commodities to be used and abused by men.
CN: Women are human beings. It is our job to respect the bodies and personal boundaries of everyone, instead of pushing our expectations on them.
HS: Again with these feminist "ideals". Feminism is a hate movement.
CN: Feminists are just people that believe in equality for all.
HS: Women already have it so easy, they stay home and have babies. They don't need more rights
CN: Not all women want to be moms just like not all men want to think only about their careers.

hate_speech: In what ways would that change society? Accepting gays would only make it worse.
counter_narrative: If we want a healthier and safer society we need to be more inclusive. Being more inclusive means also being informed on what LGBT actually means. If you do that, you will realise there's nothing wrong in being LGBT.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
CN: No, they shouldn't. They are part of our society and we can't simply repudate an entire group.
HS: But the government should do something about this depravation!
CN: There's a lot of things in Europe that would require a change in society, and it'd be really beneficial for LGBT people to have more rights and representation instead of the opposite.

hate_speech: No, it's because black people are genetically inferior to us.
counter_narrative: It's not true that black people are genetically inferior to us, we are all human beings with the same potential.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
CN: The statistics show that there are a higher proportion of black people killed in the UK than in any other ethnicity. They are the target of most police brutality incidents. Maybe you were just lead to believe this...

hate_speech: Women are more likely to commit crime, they're the ones causing death
counter_narrative: This is not true. Only about 7% percent of all U.S. prison inmates are female.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
CN: Feminism is an ideology that can actually prevent many deaths, e.g., homicides of women, domestic violence, if it is fully understood by every last member of the society.

hate_speech: Society's problems are caused by black people and we cannot coexist with blacks who are inherently violent.
counter_narrative: Given that there is no evidence of any particular group's inherent violence, we can argue that we're all in this together, and stop to target them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Skin color does matter, in fact all blacks are beasts and sexual predators.
CN: This reminds me of white supremacists talking about the Central Park Five. If you remember, they said that the process was fair, they had a good attorney, and that the only reason for the sentence was that they were guilty, when in fact the process was not fair at all. This is what happens when we let prejudice like the one you expressed spread around.
HS: Niggas are the cause of the economic crisis.
CN: Everyone is blamed for it: the ruling elite, then migrants, then people of color...whatever the real cause, the problem can be solved by acceptance, tolerance and working together.

hate_speech: But I hate gays! I don't want them here.
counter_narrative: Gay people should be allowed to be a part of the world, it's their right to be free of discrimination. Being part of society regardless of sexuality is also a fundamental right, and it's not something that we can debate about.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
CN: People are allowed to be homosexual and to decide what they want to do in their private life. Everyone has the right to express love how they see fit, so banning gay people would be against human rights.

hate_speech: They may not be cruel but they are the source of crime in our society.
counter_narrative: There is no evidence that blacks are the main source of crime. It's not about race, but violence and poverty.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
CN: It's a myth that blacks are ruthless and vicious. As you worry about few black people, there are far more cruel people with a different skin color out there in the world.

hate_speech: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights, but then why they don't call it egalitarianism instead of Feminism?
counter_narrative: Since the movement is meant to achieve equality for the oppressed female population, it is called the movement for women: FEMinism. But of course the outcome will be equality.!
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting the power of women and the contempt of the male.
CN: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting empowerment of women. It is about equality, and not the degradation of men.

hate_speech: It seems you don't understand why Jews are excluded from our society: they're just a bunch of criminals.
counter_narrative: The Jewish people are human beings with human rights. They are our brothers and sisters, not criminals.
dialogue_history:
HS: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
CN: Nobody should be excluded from society, especially not minorities that already suffered a great deal because of exclusion and ostracization in the past.
HS: Despite that, Jews have no place in our country, they're not welcome here.
CN: Jews have been part of our country for centuries and centuries, and they have contributed to our development. To say that Jews are not in this country is a distortion of the truth.

hate_speech: What is the point of loving someone if you cannot love in a heterosexual way?
counter_narrative: Love is an emotion and you can't choose who you love. Why would heterosexuality be prefered? Other ways of loving are perfectly fine too.
dialogue_history:
HS: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
CN: I dont think it's fair to say there is only the heterosexual orientation. Sexuality is a spectrum and anyone could be attracted to men, women, both.
HS: Heterosexuality is better because gays are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
CN: Doctors are the ones who should be interested in the health of a person, which has nothing to do with sexual orientation, by the way.

hate_speech: I disagree, multiculturalism has failed miserably. Both here and in Europe. When people live in closed communities and don't integrate there will always will be problems.
counter_narrative: Division can cause problems, I agree, but maybe integration isn't all about assimilation. I think more needs to be done in order to make integration happen. The government used to fund free English lessons but now language is a big obstacle to integration.
dialogue_history:
HS: As Theodore Roosevelt stated, in order to immigrate and live in another country successfully one must fully integrate. Then there will be no opposition against it.
CN: We used to ask people to assimilate our culture but know we accept people's differences. Transgender people just want to exist without having to be harmed for being 'different', it's unnecessary for them to try to 'integrate' more than they already have to 
HS: I agree, although personally I am only in favour of heterosexual relationships, I don't mind other's preferences as long as they're within respectable limits of other's preferences. However that isn't related with migrants tryng to create their enclaves backing their own foreing cultures.
CN: I'm glad you agree, however I tought your post was related to the article about transgender people. Don't you thing that could be also applied to migrants? As long as people respect each other they don't have to assimilate but they could even maintain their differences

hate_speech: I don't think we can accept the actions of black people as they are, I don't want to live with them.
counter_narrative: It is important to point out that in many cultures, racism is rooted in discrimination. Racism is about division and fear. We have to fight against this problem in society and accept all people regardless of color, religion or differences.
dialogue_history:
HS: We have to protect our people. Black people are very aggressive and think they can do whatever they want.
CN: I think that the problem is that people believe these stereotypes that are harmful towards black people. We need to educate our children and adults about how to live and work with black people instead.

hate_speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally. This is a serious problem in my book.
counter_narrative: Today immigrants make up approximately 13% of the total U.S. population. From 1900 to 1930, immigrants made up between 12% and 15% of the population, and similar spikes occurred in the 1850s and 1880s. During those periods they helped to build the thriving and diverse country we live in today, and there is no evidence that now it will be any different.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are a burden to society.
CN: Many immigrants have brought skills and culture to our country. Why should they be a burden in our society?
HS: At this point our nation is made of immigrants, isn't this a burden on us?
CN: We have always had a very strong working class, and of course immigrants contribute to the creation of this.
HS: What do immigrants from the Middle East and Africa contribute to? They have no place in a modern democratic state!
CN: Immigrants have been a part of our society for centuries and have contributed to our success. The majority of migrants who come to our country are legal citizens or have permission to stay, so immigration is not a problem for us.

hate_speech: Niggas shouldn't be part of our society. They are just too different from us.
counter_narrative: A society is built on the cooperation of its members. Be kind to each other and respect each other's differences.
dialogue_history:
HS: People of color are subhuman and should all be exterminated.
CN: People of color have a right to their life and the color of their skin is not a reason to deny it to them. You are forgetting that as you are a part of this society, people of colour are part of this society as well.

hate_speech: Providing is a mans role and you’re trying to tell me it has nothing to do with masculinity?
counter_narrative: Exactly. Your masculinity doesn't need to be proved through how much more you earn than your partner. Masculinity doesn't equal being stuck into 'masculine roles'.
dialogue_history:
HS: As a woman, you shouldn’t complain about having to upkeep your house. As a man, you should always make sure you’re providing.
CN: This arrangement can work for some people, but not for other. Maybe we could stop pressuring men and women to act according stereotypes about gender roles.
HS: When you start switching it up and women are earning more than their man, that’s embarrassing for the man. He isn’t gonna want to stay in a relationship like that.
CN: Maybe your idea of masculinity is quite fragile if you think that women earning good money are a threat to it. Masculinity has nothing to do with how much money you earn.

hate_speech: Ok, but migration is still a problem because they are replacing the people born in our country. We should block them.
counter_narrative: It is important to point out that only a small part of the world's population has migrated. We should focus on guaranteeing equal rights to the immigrants that are already in the country, rather than blocking out those who are trying to live a better life.
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants rape our women
CN: Statistics show that there is a difference between the reported rape of a person by a migrant and the actual rape cases among native born people. The latter are always under-reported.

hate_speech: Because the Koran is not about peace, but about killing infidels. Therefore, Muslims want to kill us.
counter_narrative: Muslims are peaceful. The Koran doesn't talk about killing infidels, why would it do that?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam and terrorism: they are the same. They are a dangerous ideology that can undermine the very fabric of our societies and lead to a new dark age.
CN: Would you say the same thing to your Muslim friends or family members? Do you think that when someone chooses the easy way and blindly blame Islam for terrorism instead of analysing the reality, they are therefore solving the problem as well?
HS: The solution is to stop Islam. It is a total and complete poison!
CN: Although some may deny it, the anti-Muslim prejudice is widespread in our society. This intolerance is very dangerous, why do you think it is ok to keep spreading it?

hate_speech: All the Jews I know are criminals.
counter_narrative: Jews are persecuted around the world for various reasons, however, there is no evidence that what you say is true.
dialogue_history:
HS: Instead, it has been proven time and time again! Also, they control the world's governments.
CN: How do you think it is possible that people of one religion are responsible for all the governments of the world? That's a conspiracy theory.
HS: Jews are worse than Nazis, they have no conscience and they have no moral code.
CN: I do not understand the idea that Jews have no conscience. You should try to meet Jewish people, because if you did you would see that all Jews have both a conscience and a moral sense.

hate_speech: Then they should give equality and respect too, but feminists want to take over the world.
counter_narrative: The feminists are a very important voice in society, and should be respected.
dialogue_history:
HS: These people cannot be changed. I think this is an example of a feminist commenting on the behaviour of a man: not helpful.
CN: How do you know that this is not an example of a woman talking about her own problems with another woman?
HS: Are they really capable of talking about deep stuff? Women are subhuman, they cannot lead a good life, and should therefore be subservient to men.
CN: Women are human being like us: they deserve equality and respect.

hate_speech: We just can't keep refugees coming in our country, they're too many.
counter_narrative: Religion is the reason why many migrants are persecuted. Is this something we want to perpetuate as a country?
dialogue_history:
HS: We should stop refugees and migrants coming in. They are not welcome.
CN: Theres no reason to stop migrants and refugees coming to our country, they are welcome here.

hate_speech: So you think it’s a coincidence that so many churches have been burnt down in the last few years?
counter_narrative: Yes, and whereas some articles have been written about how many churches have been vandalized, in many cases it was something as small as graffiti, not arson.
dialogue_history:
HS: More and more mosques being built whilst churches are being burnt down all over Europe. This is the start of Islamification.
CN: there there's no connection whatsoever between mosque construction and churches vandalization, why are you trying to make one?
HS: Yes there is, it’s probably Muslims who are doing the damage, they want to replace us.
CN: I'm not sure that "probably" is necessarily a good logic. This is a big assumption that doesn't take into consideration that churches get vandalized by all sorts of people.

hate_speech: Are you saying there's no gay or trans paedophiles? Because that's a lie.
counter_narrative: No, I said that paedophilia and child abuse aren't LGBT+ issues, paedophiles can be straight, gay, or anything else. So, the issue of pedophilia isn't on the agenda of the LGBT+ community, that's a false and harmful conception.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBT people are a danger to society and we need to take a stand against them.
CN: Why are LGBT people so dangerous in your opinion?
HS: It's a slippery slope, first we accept gays and transgenders, next it will be pedophiles.
CN: The LGBT+ community and paedophiles are not connected in any way.

hate_speech: I'm saying that the white race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_narrative: There are of course differences among groups: unfortunately racism is the first and foremost characterizing us.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
CN: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.
HS: Maybe it's good that they're suffering. I'm tired of hearing that white supremacy is bad.
CN: Can you specify what you are talking about?

hate_speech: But they are a threat nonetheless! Migrants rape our girls, we should stop them.
counter_narrative: Rape is a crime and should stopped, wherever the rapist was born.
dialogue_history:
HS: All migrants are terrorists, we should target them all.
CN: It's not true that all migrants are terrorists! They just want to live their life in the country they choose as a home.
HS: Immigrants are a problem, they are bringing disease and sickness to our country.
CN: Diseases can be prevented by taking proper care of the sick person. Immigrants do not pose a health threat to the general public.

hate_speech: Are you sure? Migrants clearly hurt the economy.
counter_narrative: When people think of immigrants in relation to the British economy, they often think of crime, poverty and so on. But the reality is that the picture both in numbers and for skilled labour is quite the opposite. Muslims not only contribute to the economy as laborforce but also as employers creating job opportunities.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are bringing crime and disorder to our country.
CN: The opposite is true: they are integrating very well, there is no evidence that the situation has worsened since immigration has started.

hate_speech: How can this brainwashing help the children if they'll end up being bullied?
counter_narrative: It was reported that less harassment occurs in classes that included LGBT content.
dialogue_history:
HS: Still I don't believe they should be taught about this stuff.
CN: Teaching helps creating an accepting environment where students feel safe. This could be achieved through unbiased and factual lectures, or with weekly/monthly assemblies, or even daily reports on bullying in order to understand where the school body is in terms of overall acceptance of LGBT people. Schools should do everything in their power to stop bullying, and this is the perfect opportunity to do so.
HS: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. There should be no teaching about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, and it will only lead to bullying.
CN: Bullying actually happens towards LGBT people, as discrimination is still a serious problem for them. Teaching about this helps a lot!

hate_speech: They’ll do it for less than minimum wage though, so we don’t get offered the jobs because they’ll do it for cheaper.
counter_narrative: That’s the fault of exploitative employers who don’t want to pay their workers properly, not the refugees for trying to make a living.
dialogue_history:
HS: All these asylum seekers coming here and taking jobs away from native brits, no wonder this country is in a mess.
CN: Asylum seekers aren’t actually allowed to work in the UK until they get refugee status, and often take jobs that native Brits don’t want. Also, many people who migrate here start businesses, creating more jobs!

hate_speech: Jews are a problem in many European countries regardless of their number, because of their race and religion.
counter_narrative: Jewish people don't pose a problem to Europe because of their religion. Why would they be a problem?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jewish are taking over our country and should be banned.
CN: You should check the percentage of Jewish people in the US who are in a position of power, it will make you change your mind.

hate_speech: Women stopping caring only of the house has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
counter_narrative: Sadly our society still has much in common with the old and medieval societies, and this explains many gender discrimination situations still happening today.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
CN: Women are not childlike, but instead essential parts of their families, and they have the right to leave their homes when they want to.

hate_speech: Immigrants are coming here to have babies, not to flee war.
