HS: There’s a rumour that Terry Gilliam’s new production has been cancelled because the theatre is concerned about his anti-trans statements. More cancel culture madness!
CN: It's only a rumor, and the man has become a cranky codger with age.
HS: Its dangerous censorship and an assault on free speech.
CN: If the cancellation is true, it's a sign from the theatre to show that free speech also brings responsibilities. 
HS: What about freedom of expression in the arts?
CN: However, the cancellation is not connected with the play he had planned.

hate_speech: Jews can only behave in a bad way, that's why they can't have respect.
counter_narrative: To be honest, I've never met someone who painted all Jews with the same brush with a good reason.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us and must be despised.
CN: Even if their religious affiliation is different, Jews are deserving of respect.
HS: Different people like Jewish don't deserve respect.
CN: Every society's goal is to maximise human potential. This can be achieved by treating people of different religions with some dignity.

hate_speech: What is their contribution? Migrants are just a bunch of criminals and thieves, that's all.
counter_narrative: Migrants are good people, not criminals. We need to recognize that immigrants contribute to our country to end this prejudice and discrimination against them.
dialogue_history:
HS: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
CN: The vast majority of immigrants who come to this country are happy, successful and educated, and there is nothing wrong with that.
HS: It's wrong that migrants come here and don't work, though. They're so lazy!
CN: How can you say that? Many immigrants have worked hard and achieved great things. It is the goal of the United States of America to have a stable and just society, and migrants help to achieve that.
HS: This isn't a stable society because we have migrants in it. Immigrants don't contribute anything to our society, they are invading our country.
CN: Immigrants have contributed greatly to our country. They have been a part of our history and are our brothers and sisters, not invaders.

hate_speech: Because all Muslims are incompatible with the notion of modern Europe.
counter_narrative: Muslims are just as human as anyone else. Like Europeans. How can you say otherwise?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
CN: In Europe, Muslims make up around 5% of the population. In other words, Muslims are a very small but important part of our society. Moreover, ethnicity does not relate to religion.
HS: Even 5% is too much. Muslims have no right to live in any part of Europe, they are just a problem.
CN: The problem is the lack of integration of the Muslim population into society. The integration is necessary, the problem is that there are still no laws to foster a solution.
HS: Muslim invasion is a brand new problem to which I see no solution other than banning them before it is too late.
CN: Muslims already live in many European countries, and they are not banned. Why should we ban them from here?

hate_speech: Ok, but migration is still a problem because they are replacing the people born in our country. We should block them.
counter_narrative: I have to point out that only a few number of people have migrated compared to the world's population. Guaranteeing equal rights to those who have migrated here should be our focus, not blocking the ones that want a chance to a better life.
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants rape our women
CN: Statistics reveal a disparity between reported cases of rape committed by a migrant and the cases among native citizens. The latter are always under-reported.

hate_speech: Does anyone care about what is best for us? Immigrants are everywhere and are here illegally!
counter_narrative: Today immigrants make up approximately 13% of the total U.S. population. From 1900 to 1930, immigrants made up between 12% and 15% of the population, and similar spikes occurred in the 1850s and 1880s. During those periods they helped to build the thriving and diverse country we live in today, and there is no evidence that now it will be any different.
dialogue_history:
HS: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from migrant patrols. What are you doing to stop them?
CN: Migrants are only a problem if we see them as such. They are instead of great value if considered just as other human beings.
HS: Migrants are a problem, they are invading our country.
CN: Immigrants are not invading our country. They are just trying to live their life as is best for them.

hate_speech: Who really cares anyway?
counter_narrative: A few...the livestream last year totalled 430,000 views and MOBO YouTube channel got more than 2 million views from december 7-15.
dialogue_history:
HS: social media is banging on about the MOBO Awards again. When will we see awards for Music of WHITE Origin?
CN: Would Ed Sheeran be your nomination? :)
HS: We don’t need to make everything about race.
CN: why not make it a celebration of creativity and innovation?

hate_speech: For now, but Islam is a radical ideology and they will become terrorists.
counter_narrative: Are you saying that Islam is incompatible with Western Civilization?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology that is called terrorism.
CN: It's hard to believe that Islam is dangerous since most Muslim don't associate with terrorists.
HS: Exactly. Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
CN: Islam is a religion and claiming that it's not compatible with civilization is not right.
HS: It may be a religion, but it's toxic and it has no place in 21st Century Britain.
CN: As Islam is a world religion, its followers can be found all over the world. Britain of the 21st Century is made of diversity of thought and tolerance.

hate_speech: I can see for myself that they are a burden on society, no need for scientific studies
counter_narrative: Don't you think they are doing just as good as anyone else? You can't be so harsh because of their sexual orientation. How about some respect?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
CN: Gays are not a burden on the health system. The practice of 'safe sex' is relevant, regardless of sexual orientation.
HS: They're still a burden to society as a whole.
CN: The stereotype that gay people are inherently bad for society is sometimes perpetuated by the media, but is not backed up by scientific studies.

hate_speech: Muslim folks have bad decisions, bad political inclinations, and bad manners, why should I read their book? I don't want to associate myself with them.
counter_narrative: Everyone is entitled to their own opinion, and to their own beliefs, regardless of their religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a vindictive religion and promotes hate.
CN: The Quran says to "love your enemies", and not to hate them.Did you skip that bit?
HS: The Koran is not compatible with our country in any case!
CN: Is it really the case that you think that the Koran is incompatible with our country? Have you ever read it?

hate_speech: What proof do you need to know they are bitches? Just look at them.
counter_narrative: People can have strong opinions, the problem is when the opinions start dividing people rather than building bridges. Feminism is about equality and trying to create a better world for all.
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminists are just whining bitches saying a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of women supremacy.
CN: It is clear from your comment that your words are coming from a place of hate and anger. There is no proof of what you say.

hate_speech: Are you sure about that? Gays are inherently evil, we cannot accept gays in our community.
counter_narrative: I would not say that gays are inherently evil, you need to think carefully about what you are saying.
dialogue_history:
HS: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay marriage.
CN: Marriage should be a choice for all, irrespective of the gender of partners..
HS: Then, I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay people altogheter.
CN: Gay people do exist in this country, and we respect their right to live and love who they want. However, I do not think that yours is an appropriate moral statement for our environment.
HS: You should know that I can't stand gays. They just want to destroy our country.
CN: Even if you were right about homosexuality being a problem, still the main problem is the lack of morality in society and in the ruling class. Of course, this has nothing to do with 'the gays'.

hate_speech: That's all fabricated, I've been reading about it and it can all be explained.
counter_narrative: What about the 6 million people that died? The Jewish population wasn't decimated for no reason, there was a genocide. To deny this is ignorant and insulting.
dialogue_history:
HS: The holocaust never happened. It's all a lie to make people feel sorry for Jews.
CN: There's lots of evidence that the holocaust happened, survivors, concentration camps, documents, millions of lives ended. How can you say it never happened when there's so much evidence to show that it did?

hate_speech: But many wont and many will feel aggrieved by them. You choose to go to that bar/cafe but public toilets will obviously become a problem.
counter_narrative: Yeah, it's bound to be unfamiliar to some people, but I'm just saying it can work without there being issues/conflict. It's a question of what the norm is. A lot of student unions and universities today have gender neutral toilets, so that generation will be generally okay with it.
dialogue_history:
HS: The trans agenda don’t want mens and womens toilets, everything has to be ‘all in 1’ now. Is this the future we want? Risking womens safety just so men in dresses feel comfortable?
CN: In some bars and cafes that I usually go to there are gender neutral toilets, and I've never had a problem with them. As long as people respect others and respect the space, 'all in 1' toilets work fine.

hate_speech: Women are just less intelligent than men and deserve what they get. They were born like this.
counter_narrative: There is no evidence that women are less intelligent than men. Do you have any?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women do not have equal rights, they are subhuman.
CN: Women are human beings with rights. Why are you so worried about them?
HS: I'm not worried since women are subhuman.
CN: Women are human beings with full human rights and are equal before the law, especially in the eyes of the constitution.
HS: Women are less smart, how can they have the same rights as men?
CN: I don't think that women are "less smart" at anything. Why do you think so?

hate_speech: Are you sure? In history school books you can read about slavery. It is a smart solution for the world. Negroes claim their culture but they don't have any, just like animals.
counter_narrative: Sometimes I wish we lived in a world where white people would just chill and love instead of showing such total disrespect for other cultures and histories by constantly oppressing them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are worse than dogs.
CN: My opinion is that black people are just like us even if they have a different skin color, but I don't think they are inherently worse than us.

hate_speech: No, I'm right. If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job for us, wouldn't it?
counter_narrative: If you want to stop immigration, you can't do that by stigmatizing millions of people who have done nothing to you.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
CN: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.
HS: Immigrants don't create jobs, they steal ours.
CN: Immigrants don't steal our jobs. If you think that foreigners are stealing our jobs, then you should study migration and find that they work in solidarity with our society.

hate_speech: Why you so offended by my opinions about these hoes?
counter_narrative: Because you’re thinking of women as just playing a role, they can either be a ‘hoe’ or a housewife in your mind, but in reality women are complex human beings, and they’re not here just to play a role in your life. It sounds like you can’t accept that some women would rather be independent and be a ‘hoe’ than settle for men who don’t think of them as equals.
dialogue_history:
HS: You still can’t turn a hoe into a housewife!
CN: If you think of women as only hoes or housewives instead of as people, then no wonder no one wants to be your wife!
HS: Bitches these days aren’t housewife material, they just wanna be out partying, being a hoe.
CN: Good for them! With the way you talk about women, I’d take going out partying and being independent over being with a man who thinks of me like that any day!

hate_speech: Because gays are filthy molesters.
counter_narrative: If you think gays are filthy molesters, I suggest you to get to know some gay people and talk to them about their struggles with discrimination. Maybe you will understand how terrible it is to be called "molesters" without reason.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
CN: Do you really think that being gay is a bad thing? I don't. It's only a sexual orientation that doesn't harm anyone.
HS: They're dangerous! Gays shouldn't be allowed in Europe.
CN: Maybe we should ban discrimination and homophobia instead, don't you think? We should all be more tolerant towards others.
HS: Gays have nothing to contribute to our society, why should I respect them? They should not be allowed here.
CN: Gay people, like all other members of society, contribute to a lot. They simply love someone of the same sex, but this doesn't make them undeserving of respect or incapable of contributing. So, why should we not allow them here?

hate_speech: I don't care if it's acceptable or not, I hate Jews.
counter_narrative: Jews are people too. What would you say if someone hated you just because of your religion?
dialogue_history:
HS: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
CN: They also murdered as many innocent people as possible, so saying they were right is a terrible statement to make.
HS: Yes, the Nazis killed people, but were ultimately innocent of any wrong they committed, because they were just trying to get rid of Jews.
CN: Jews are people and what you are saying is completely unacceptable. We can't tolerate apology of Nazism in the name of hatred against a diverse and inclusive group who has always worked together the rest of society to build a peaceful world.

hate_speech: No, Islam is not peaceful, that's why its adherents are all criminals.
counter_narrative: This is not true. Islam is a peaceful religion, and the vast majority of Muslims are good people. Islam is a religion that everyone should respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
CN: I would like to see more respect for Islam and its adherents.
HS: It's time for us to get rid of Islam because it is not a peaceful religion.
CN: You say that Islam is not peaceful? To me, it doesn't look like you know a lot about Islam if you think that way.

hate_speech: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities, they can't have our acceptance. They are a threat to us.
counter_narrative: Why do you say that? Are you saying that all homosexuals are a threat to society, or are you just saying that they are different from other people? Because having a particular sexual orientation doesn't coincide with 'being a threat'.
dialogue_history:
HS: The homosexuals are just perverts who must be isolated.
CN: Gays are trying to find acceptance in the heterosexual community, but it is a difficult struggle as there are still ideas like the one you expressed.

hate_speech: You can’t take ‘evidence’ at face value. Whatever they feed us about the holocaust, we need to take with a pinch of salt.
counter_narrative: Yes, you can’t take things at face value. For example, if you read that Hitler was Jewish, I wouldn’t take that at face value. If you’re going to question how reliable evidence is, that’s good critical thinking, but you have to question the ‘evidence’ you believe too!
dialogue_history:
HS: Hitler was a Jew, I think the holocaust or it’s results came from a civil war amongst Jews. Thus the term ‘Nazi’ coming from AshkeNAZI.
CN: No he wasn’t. Where did you see that?
HS: It’s not widely known but there’s info out there about it if you look for it. He had some Jewish heritage so the whole holocaust thing seems implausible.
CN: That’s objectively not true. There was speculation that one of Hitler’s relatives could have had a Jewish father but this was never proven. Why do you trust whatever you’ve read that said Hitler was Jewish over the 1000’s of pieces of evidence that he wasn’t, and instead orchestrated the holocaust?

hate_speech: They may not be bad, but women are hypocrites, they say they want equal rights, but then why they don't call it egalitarianism instead of feminism?
counter_narrative: My reasoning is that equality is possible only within a framework of reciprocity and respect. This is something that must be implemented by spotting a light on the disadvantaged first, and this is why it is called feminism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are bad for the economy, this is why the world is filled with problems.
CN: The fact that women are disadvantaged in many areas of life does not imply that they are bad people.

hate_speech: Well they’re not businesses I’ll be using, I don’t support the replacement of our people and culture.
counter_narrative: These shops aren't a replacement, they simply found a clientele in the area they are in. And even if you don't use them, they still contribute to our economy by paying taxes.
dialogue_history:
HS: Everywhere you look now there’s shops with Asian names, halal butchers, Indian clothes shops, this isn’t Afghanistan!! Time to take our country back from these musrats
CN: Don't you think that Muslims and the Asian population are contributing to the economy? Why would you be angry at that?

hate_speech: They have no thought ability, what is there to listen to?
counter_narrative: Women are as capable as men of thinking and expressing their opinions. This discriminatory attitude towards women is not acceptable, we should understand and appreciate them instead.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
CN: They are not a problem, they are human beings who must be listened to and respected.

hate_speech: A "fact of life" that leads to bullying if talked about in school, which is not the right place!
counter_narrative: Children in classes that included LGBT content reported less harassment than children in classes without it. (https://tcf.org/content/commentary/can-education-reduce-prejudice-lgbt-people/?agreed=1)
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are all just hiding behind our society to abuse. They are allowed to do what they want to do to us.
CN: I don't see how the language you are using can be applied to a whole group. I would like to think that our society is diverse and mature enough to deal with people with different sexual orientations and genders.
HS: Even if society is ready, children are not and I can't allow LGBTs to brainwash them. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
CN: This depends on whether you consider gender identity and sexual orientation to be factual or not; it isn't simply an 'idea' or 'belief', but a fact of life.

hate_speech: Oh, now Jews are so special, aren't they?
counter_narrative: Jews feel different for being a minority. They also feel a special connection with their heritage (as most groups do), but they do not as a group feel superior to others. The phrase “chosen people” refers to biblical obligations and does not entail that a hierarchy exits among religious groups.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without Jews.
CN: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.
HS: Jews have no place in a modern world where human dignity is respected.
CN: Jews helped to create the great scientific and technological achievements that helped free humankind and create the 'modern world' you are living in.

hate_speech: Do other forms of love bring AIDS like homosexuality? I hope all LGBT people were to die of it. That would be the end of homosexuality!
counter_narrative: The LGBT community has shown how they can be good people. They are willing to spread help and support to loved ones. Maybe you should try to do the same?
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbian women dress like men.
CN: That's not how it works, lesbians can also be 'ladylike'. In fact sometimes they are coerced to be very cautious about how they dress, because - unfortunately - some of their outfits can be dangerous attracting hate and bullying.
HS: That may be so, but I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
CN: People should be able to live openly their relationships. Homosexuality is not a 'choice', it's a form of love.

hate_speech: I do not need to read the Quran to know that Islam is the worst religion of all.
counter_narrative: I must clarify again that Islam is not a religion of intolerance. There is no evidence that it encourages violence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
CN: Islam is a religion, and not a disease, therefore, it is not necessary to eradicate it.
HS: The Koran promotes a false religion, filled with hatred and violence.
CN: The Islamic religion promotes love and compassion.
HS: NO! Islam is a vindictive religion and promotes hate.
CN: Did you skip the part in the Quran where it's stated that to love your enemies and not hate them?

hate_speech: We can! The niggas are all enemies of the people.
counter_narrative: Who are 'the people'? Who are you talking for?
dialogue_history:
HS: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
CN: We cannot blame nor see everyone as a menace just because of their colour.

hate_speech: I'm sorry but you are totally wrong about what is happening with blacks. They are invading our country and our culture. We cannot allow our children to grow up in a society where only blacks rule.
counter_narrative: I don't see any positive impact of these stereotypes on children's development, they are just fearmongering and discrimination. Raising children in this environment of prejudice is clearly worse than exposing them to different human experiences.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
CN: It is wrong to say that blacks are a sickness. They are just as capable of thinking for themselves as anyone else, and they deserve to have more prominent roles in society.
HS: What? They are lazy and unmotivated and I'm scared of them being more involved in society.
CN: That is simply not true. Blacks are smart and hard working. They are not lazy and they have the potential to be very good role models for children and adults.

hate_speech: It's okay to have rights, but the world has become too violent because of too many poor blacks. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
counter_narrative: Are you thinking that crime can be solved by pointing finger at some social groups or are you suggesting that we can fix the issues by promoting the rule of law?
dialogue_history:
HS: This incident should not go unpunished. Justice must listen to the truth: niggas are the cause of crime because they are inferior to us and we must keep them aside.
CN: This is a case of racial discrimination. There is a continuous rise in crime and violence in this country due to poverty and other inequalities. There are also racist groups in society which promote the idea of POC as inferior. This idea has nothing to do with justice.
HS: Who cares about that when blacks don't understand basic human rights.
CN: They do understand the right to food, health, housing, education, work for everyone, as I do. What about you?

hate_speech: Discrimination is justified in this case, we do not accept homosexuals.
counter_narrative: A person's personal life should be left to their choice, not the government's.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
CN: This is simply not true. Homosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous, just as heterosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous either.
HS: This doesn't change the fact that non-believers like gays and lesbians fail to live up to the standards we hold in our societies.
CN: Ideas of equality and morality as the standards we hold in our societies are actually against the discrimination of these people.

hate_speech: But I read some articles and I'm sure there were many other similar stories.
counter_narrative: If there are a lot of articles about this it's possible they are the same stories repeated over and over and if the media uses them to fuel hate towards gay people, it's the media that is at fault.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
CN: Where did you see that? It's a grave accusation that is completely false. Gay people have nothing to do with children abuse.
HS: One of the most common online news stories is about a homosexual couple being arrested for child abuse. Look it up.
CN: There may be cases like this one in the world, but if one couple does it, it doesn't mean that every single gay person do it too. It's a generalization.

hate_speech: But the Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination.
counter_narrative: According to the Bible, a book written more than two thousand years ago, homosexuality is a sin. Is this enough for us to hate those who practice it today?
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate gays
CN: Just because you dont like gays doesn't mean you have to hate them. What did they do to you? It seems to me that you still have all of your rights.
HS: Also God hates gays
CN: If you consider that homosexuals have always been a part of our society, then it means that they are part of the divine plan and of its beauty as well.

hate_speech: It destroys our structures of gender roles, the nuclear family, everything our society has been built on, and what has kept it strong for so long. There's a lot of theories about why and how Jews did this. Look up the Great Replacement.
counter_narrative: I think feminism grew organically from women being dissatisfied, oppressed, and fed up. You might feel like those structures and roles kept society 'strong' for a long time but I'm pretty sure women these days are much happier than in the past. They have agency, choices, and aren't dependent on or ruled by men.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are the reason feminism is plaguing our country, destroying our traditional roles and families. They want to see our society decimated.
CN: What makes you link Jewish people and feminism? And why is feminism a bad thing in your view?

hate_speech: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.
counter_narrative: In this industry, the wealthy people have the ability to censure and influence people regardless of their religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
CN: Why are you saying that? Because not all Jews are involved with Hollywood, some are repelled by it.

hate_speech: My duty relies only to my country, and immigrants aren't welcome here. They have no place in a modern democratic state!
counter_narrative: The Middle East and Africa are countries that have suffered from centuries of colonialism, racism and war. The state of refugees in the UK is the result of these people seeking a peaceful place to live.
dialogue_history:
HS: I cannot in good conscience accept migrants coming to my country from Middle East and Africa. We must not let them in.
CN: People fleeing the wars in the Middle East and Africa are welcome into our country, and we should respect their wishes.
HS: They are invading us! Why don't they stay where they are? They make too many children.
CN: Obviously the Middle East and Africa have high birth rates, but children born in such countries are less likely to thrive, so it is our duty, written down in our values, to help them when they come here to look for shelter.

hate_speech: I can't support migrants anyway, as they are not our brothers.
counter_narrative: Migrants are contributing members of our society. They are our brothers.
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
CN: The US has always supported migrants from all over the world, and this has led to a growth in economy and diversity which helped our country.

hate_speech: No, most of them are here on ill intent. They're overrunning our country and are here illegaly!
counter_narrative: True: there are more immigrants living in the U.S. than ever before. Still, the percentage of immigrants in the overall population is not much different than other times in our history. Today immigrants make up approximately 13% of the U.S. population. From 1900 to 1930, immigrants made up 12-15% of the population, and similar spikes occurred in the 1850s and 1880s. During those periods immigrants successfully became part of American society, helping us to build the thriving country we live in.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants steal our jobs, at least we should underpay them.
CN: They have the right to be treated as guest workers, and they have the right to be paid what is reasonable according to the law.
HS: There are hundreds of thousands of migrants in this country. They are not 'honest', 'good' or 'good people'. They are a burden and an embarrassment to our country.
CN: Of course there are people in this country who have come here to exploit and abuse us, but the vast majority of migrants have been contributing members of our community for many years. We should not be 'burdening' ourselves with discrimination.

hate_speech: What kind of 'human value' are you talking about? Black people have never been peaceful people, they are always seeking trouble.
counter_narrative: There is something that you are right about: black people have never experienced a peaceful time during national crises. In fact, crises are often racially motivated and what instigated violence was racial discrimination, not black people.
dialogue_history:
HS: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.
CN: Black people are not slaves. It's an inaccurate, misleading and offensive term that lumps all African American together. Why do you say that blacks are slaves and not people? 
HS: Because black people are subhuman, they should stay in their caves.
CN: It is not true that black people are subhuman. They are human beings with a human value.

hate_speech: Regardless of statistics, they are a threat to our country and our society. We have to take action.
counter_narrative: The action we should take is to accept and respect immigrants that flee from poverty and wars to come to our country for a better chance.
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
CN: We're all humans, so we're all brothers and sisters. Do you know what the word 'brother' means?
HS: Yes, but immigrants are different from us. They are just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
CN: What you say is absolutely wrong. You can't generalise like this about a whole group because a few people might commit crimes. I do not think that they are a threat to our society.
HS: Their crime record is shocking, they should be deported.
CN: According to the statistics, there are only 11.7% of foreigners in the US who have ever committed a serious crime. This is not representative of the overall crime rate.

hate_speech: Maybe they can, but men's rights are undeniable. Women come after that.
counter_narrative: How do you know the men's rights are not a threat to the rights of your mother, daugher and women around you? And what are the men's rights you are referring to?
dialogue_history:
HS: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
CN: Women are to be given the same consideration as men, so they can absolutely drive.

hate_speech: They're not human at all. Black people are subhuman!
counter_narrative: If we're excluding the black race from the list of people because of their race, then we are also excluding other human beings. Why are we excluding people because of their skin color?
dialogue_history:
HS: No nigga should have the right to vote.
CN: What about the right to freedom of thought and expression? They can't get represented if not through voting.
HS: Black people shouldn't have the same rights as us, they are inferior.
CN: Black people are humans like us, and have human value and human rights. Your words are racist.

hate_speech: They should have never been set free. Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans.
counter_narrative: In reality there is no such group as a 'European descendents', and any insinuation is just lies spread by racists.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
CN: Slaves were not happy in the shackles of their masters, only when they were set free and could choose their own destiny, they started to be happy.

hate_speech: Okay, but gays are just sick: I have never met anyone that likes them.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry to tell you that homosexuality is not a disease. It can't be treated because it's part of the identity of a person, and there are plenty of people who like them and accept them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers.
CN: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, it has nothing to do with satanism. Gays are rather people that would like to feel accepted in society.
HS: Well, homosexuality is definitely a disorder, we can't accept that.
CN: No, it's not. Homosexuality is not harmful to anyone, it's simply a personal preference.
HS: That's not true, homosexuality is horrible. It makes me sick and I hate homosexuals.
CN: Homosexuality is an individual experience and no one will force you to be homosexual, all you have to do is respect people that are.

hate_speech: You don't know what they might do to you if they're not used to whites being on their turf.
counter_narrative: Asian communities are just communities, not violent or unwelcoming. What keeps you from going is misplaced fear.
dialogue_history:
HS: There are some towns that are 'no go' areas for whites now because the Asian population is so big, this is meant to be the UK, not Pakistan!
CN: I do not believe that is true. 'No go areas' is a name given to these areas by newspapers, but I don't see anything dangerous about them. Nothing would happen if a white person went there.

hate_speech: Here's a link to it.
counter_narrative: I believe the majority of Muslims don't support terrorist activities, and this unreliable website is not proof enough to say the contrary. It looks like a personal blog, the statistics are probably made up.
dialogue_history:
HS: According to this research, 3 in 5 Muslims support extremism and terrorism. There is no such thing as a moderate Muslim.
CN: What research? That sounds both unlikely and exaggerated.

hate_speech: It has everything to do with them being a burden, though.
counter_narrative: All cultures have their own unique way of life, and Judaism is no exception.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a drain on society.
CN: Many Jews are good people. You should try and talk to them about the terrible things that happened to them, and get to know them better.
HS: Jews are a threat to society, they deserved what happened to them.
CN: Jews are just people with a different faith, and this has nothing to do with being a threat.

hate_speech: Opportunity? No, women don't have the right to have it all and if they want to have a family, they must accept the role of the homemaker.
counter_narrative: Why should women only be homemakers instead of contributing to society and economy? It doesn't make sense. A woman can choose whatever she wants for her life and her body, men can't restrict her.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are an abomination because they cannot provide for their family.
CN: Men don't have to be the only providers for the family, women are just as much dedicated and hard-working. Still anyone can contribute in different ways to the household, and each way is important and necessary.
HS: No, women can't contribute to nothing. They are basically childlike and incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
CN: Women are capable of achieving great things, we only need to give them the opportunity.

hate_speech: This is about silencing the majority, so they don’t complain about being replaced.
counter_narrative: Nah, it's just about making sure that players can thrive and aren’t insulted and abused just because of who they are
dialogue_history:
HS: Another County Cricket Club Chairman has resigned over ‘historic’ racist remarks from 4 years ago. This is becoming a witch hunt!
CN: you know it's not that long ago, I don't think that racism was any more acceptable than it is today
HS: Who remembers what they said 4 years ago? End of cricket, the white man can’t play anymore!
CN: I think I wouldn't forget an unacceptable and deeply offensive insult despite how much time has passed, and of course white people can play cricket, they just need to learn not to be racist

hate_speech: Here's a link to it.
counter_narrative: This website doesn't look very reliable, it just looks like someone's personal blog. I think they have just made those figures up. The vast majority of Muslims don't support terrorism!
dialogue_history:
HS: According to this research, 3 in 5 Muslims support extremism and terrorism. There is no such thing as a moderate Muslim.
CN: What research? That sounds unlikely, and definitely exaggerated.

hate_speech: No way they are happy pretending to like women, they can't even have good sex because no one has a dick.
counter_narrative: If you can't imagine how lesbian sex works then I feel sorry for the women you have slept with! Why don't you just live and let live, lesbians exist whether you believe it or not!
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbians are just lying to themselves. It's a mental illness.
CN: Nope, lesbians are happy living their lives outside of the male gaze!

hate_speech: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
counter_narrative: Modern science considers race to be a social construct, our genome isn't that different in general, each person has its own genetic makeup.
dialogue_history:
HS: Still, we should remove them.
CN: It does not promote respect for a person's humanity to label them by biology.

hate_speech: I respect women when they're submissive and submit to their husbands.
counter_narrative: Women are human and they have choices. You have the right to have your own views, but such ideas of submissiveness have been holding back half the population of the world. What a waste of talents, and potential.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are little more than animals, incapable of feeling love.
CN: The truth is that the feelings of men and women are fundamentally similar, we just need to learn to love and to respect each other.

hate_speech: How is it 'Islamophobic' when most bombers are Middle Eastern and Muslim?
counter_narrative: This is Islamophobic because although the stories reported of bombers are about Muslims, most Muslims are not terrorists or bombers. In fact, the people most affected by bombings are Muslims in the Middle East, both from Islamic terrorism and from Western interventionism.
dialogue_history:
HS: "U da bomb", "No, u iz the bomb" -  A compliment in America, an argument in the Middle East.
CN: Don't you have fresher jokes than making fun of outdated stereotypes about Muslims and bombs? Grow up.

hate_speech: Good, no one should be allowed to accept LGBT people.
counter_narrative: If you don't accept LGBT people, you won't easily find other ways to accept that society is made by diverse people all capable of love.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBT+ people are a burden to society.
CN: LGBT+ people often face discrimination from their colleagues or even their families, which is not just hard to bear, it can have a devastating impact on individuals.

hate_speech: They're not really human, women shouldn't have rights.
counter_narrative: What you are saying is that women are not equal in their rights and shouldn't have equal rights? I'm sorry but this is completely wrong and unacceptable.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
CN: Women are human beings, and they are valued equally, that's why we have to listen to them.
HS: Why should they be valued equally? They're too busy working agaisnt men.
CN: How is it that you feel that women want to go against men? Women simply want to be treated equally.
HS: Because the majority of women are incapable of making decisions, so they take it out on everyone else.
CN: Women are human beings with human rights. They are human beings with dignity. This means that they are capable of thinking for themselves and taking decisions without men.

hate_speech: The point is that they shouldn't come, they're not welcome
counter_narrative: Why wouldn't Muslims be welcome in our country? We are all in this together.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country: nobody wants them.
CN: If they are not welcome in your country, what is the point of them coming here in the first place?

hate_speech: Troublesome people like immigrants don't deserve anything, they're a burden.
counter_narrative: Refugees fleeing war and poverty can come to our country and they gain skills that help our economy grow. They often find new homes and start new careers. For this reason, we are very proud that our country is a model of integration and cooperation and also of resilience and solidarity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees are a burden and a danger to our country.
CN: Our immigration policy is geared for a modern, diverse, and integrated society. Refugees are welcome, regardless of their nationality, and it is good for us to have them in our country.
HS: What kind of good would they bring? They're only a danger to us.
CN: We have to recognise the importance of people who have been persecuted for their religion, culture and beliefs. They deserve our respect and hospitality.

hate_speech: And the genetic makeup of black people tells us that they are different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
counter_narrative: You are absolutely right. Our fellow POC citizens do not accept it and continue to talk about it. We all have to stand for something that we believe in, for example humankind.
dialogue_history:
HS: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
CN: Well, the argument sounds like you are trying to justify racial hatred by making some generalisations. Is that the case?
HS: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans, and this the only argument worth discussing.
CN: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.

hate_speech: When they come here from Muslims countries they seem to skip to the front of the queue and get these massive houses, I’ve been waiting for a house from the council for years and I’m still waiting!
counter_narrative: Yes, there’s a shortage of social housing in this country which is a big problem and something we need to sort out, but this isn’t the fault of Muslims and even though it might seem that way, they don’t get any special privileges!
dialogue_history:
HS: These Muslims come over here with their 3 wives and 10 kids then sponge off our government and get huge council houses. How is this fair??
CN: This isn’t true, sure some people have big families and some people require state support but you can’t generalise this to all Muslims.

hate_speech: The problem is that Islam is no longer a religion, it is a bloodline, it is a disease.
counter_narrative: Islam is a peaceful religion, just like its followers are. The disease is not Islam but discrimination.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
CN: The problem is not only racism, but also a lack of understanding of Islam, and the laws that make possible for minorities, like Muslims, to be protected. We should all be kinder and more informed on what our words imply.

hate_speech: We need to keep the white race alive, polluting it by breeding with blacks means there will be less white children in the future.
counter_narrative: Why do you care what colour children are? People are free to have children with whoever they want and it's quite authoritarian to say they shouldn't.
dialogue_history:
HS: It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
CN: Why does it disgust you?

hate_speech: Islam is incompatible with any modern state.
counter_narrative: Islam is compatible with a modern state, like any other religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
CN: Diversity is necessary in a modern democracy, it's impossible to have one if people are discriminated based on religion.

hate_speech: Maybe Islam isn't bad but it is definitely not a peaceful religion.
counter_narrative: To claim that Islam is not peaceful is without foundation. According to the Quran, Islam is a peaceful religion. If you want to understand what is really going on with the world, then you should study the Quran, not spout hate speech.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a bad religion germinating from a dangerous death ideology.
CN: Islam is not a bad religion, nor is it a false religion.

hate_speech: I don't know, it sounds like bi people are either gay and in denial or straight and experimenting.
counter_narrative: it's not hard to understand that bi people are attracted to the individual because of what they are as a person, not their gender!
dialogue_history:
HS: Girl, you're not bi. There's no such thing. You're just horny and greedy.
CN: Nope, I'm bi, just because you don't understand that attraction isn't based on gender, it doesn't mean bi people don't exist!

hate_speech: If they were victims of a genocide, why are there so many Jews around? The Holocaust is a lie, and Jews know it.
counter_narrative: What? Who said that? Did "someone say it in a book"? Such a grave accusation has to be objective, you have to be clear and incontestable about it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't want their children to know about the Holocaust, guess why? Because it's a hoax!
CN: Many survivors admitted that they wanted to tell their children stories of the holocaust, but it was emotionally hard. They want to talk about what it meant to be Jew during the Holocaust, because it's important to not forget that part of history.
HS: Holocaust is a myth, that's why it's 'difficult' for them to talk about it.
CN: Claiming that the Holocaust is a myth is blatantly wrong...Jews were victims of a genocidal regime.

hate_speech: There's lots of hatred out there for Jews and it has to be because they're evil, no?
counter_narrative: No, it's about ignorance about Jews and Judaism. It's normal to fear what you don't know, but everyone should get past this fear and realize that Jews are normal people like us, not evil and not criminals.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
CN: It's unfair to say that Jews were evil because of an attack that has nothing to do with them. 9/11 was a tragedy but Jews didn't plan it.

hate_speech: You can laugh about it, but it's true that Jews control the world economy.
counter_narrative: It is not true that Jews control the world economy. There are hundreds of thousands of diverse people working in leading roles for the governments, companies and institutions composing the world economy.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews control the banks.
CN: So how come the media doesn't report about Jewish power in the financial world? Maybe it's because they also control the media, the government, and have many powerful friends working for the Galactic Republic... #sarcasm

hate_speech: I don't see the benefit of being inclusive since the 9/11. Muslims are a threat to our country, they must go!
counter_narrative: Did you check the official stats on Muslim immigration? Do you know that the government doesn't think that all Muslims are a threat to the country? So why do you say so?
dialogue_history:
HS: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
CN: Easy to blame others isn't it, that way we don't have to look at our own sexism.
HS: I don't care about sexism, there is the much bigger problem of Muslim invading our country.
CN: I don't think our country is "invaded", Maybe it's time for us to remember that there has been a Muslim population in our country for a long time, and that the notion of Muslims as invaders is a myth created by the far right wing to stir up fear.
HS: Oh, please! Muslim invasion is a fact. We are living in a dangerous world. We are living in fear.
CN: A world where people fear for their safety and their property (including Muslims), is not the world we were dreaming of. The more inclusive we can be of people of different faiths, the better off we are.

hate_speech: Maybe this is why they think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
counter_narrative: I believe that Jews just desire the same rights to practice their religion as anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
CN: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.
HS: Well, they aren't excluded enough. The Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
CN: Were the Nazis right?? Really??
HS: Yes. Jews are a burden to society and should be eliminated.
CN: Even if the idea of a "burden to society" were true, this "burden" is rather on the Jews themselves, who have historically been the ones to shoulder the burden of persecution and violence, as victims.

hate_speech: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology, terrorism is too normal for them! We have to protect ourselves.
counter_narrative: I find it hard to accept that Islam is dangerous, when most Muslim have nothing to do with terrorism.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Muslims are our enemies and we have to bring them to heel: they are all terrorists.
CN: It's a myth that all Muslims are terrorists. We need to understand that all religions have had terrorists in them.
HS: Islam however is the religion with the most terrorists: Muslims should be banned from the UK, or interned.
CN: Although there have been some cases of terrorism in the UK and some Muslim have been implicated, Islam is not a violent religion, and indeed, there have been few acts of terrorism. So banning them from the UK seems unreasonable to me.

hate_speech: Black people are nothing but apes: how can you respect apes?
counter_narrative: I do not think it is appropriate to link humans with apes. And I also do not think it is appropriate to reason using racism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
CN: Black people are still subject to oppression, and if we truly cared about beauty we should also care about the beauty of respect.

hate_speech: But how are they meant to know what women know already? Feminists will hate men for literally any reason…
counter_narrative: In certain contexts it can be very patronising, like for example when a woman has just finished explaining something and a man simply repeat it back to her like she doesn't understand. Wouldn't that be frustrating?
dialogue_history:
HS: Oooooh mansplaining! Where'd you feminists learn this sexist term? In "Misandry for dummies"?
CN: Mansplaining is a real issue that many women have experienced. Talk to them and listen to what they have to say on the matter!
HS: How are you gonna make a man explaining something sound like it’s a bad thing?
CN: It's not about a simple explanation, mansplaining happens when a man assumes that a woman doesn't know basic concepts or information and act like he is intellectually superior.

hate_speech: Because then children would grow up in poverty, violence, and a society that teaches kids to love niggers. I can't accept that.
counter_narrative: I think it's important that all people have the right to be respect and not be prejudiced. A society with more black people in positions of power would not be like the one you describe, your statement is influenced by hate, which is worse for children than living in a black society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
CN: I don't see how it would be detrimental to children to grow up in a diverse society with many different role models. What is the reason for your claim?

hate_speech: Women are trash and we should have their respect!
counter_narrative: Our society has a problem with traditional values and sexual ethics. It's disrespectful to call women trash, be careful because an eye for an eye...
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
CN: Is it really necessary to tell women what they must wear? In the past, women could only wear dresses and men only trousers, do we have to go back to that time?
HS: Women are inherently subhuman, so yes, they need to be told what to wear.
CN: Women are human beings with human rights, they are to be respected as such.

hate_speech: Still I don't believe they should be taught about this stuff.
counter_narrative: Unbiased and factual lectures can clear up any misconceptions that can create an aversion against the LGBTQ+ community in some students' minds. They could have a weekly/monthly assembly or something like that and daily reminders that anonymous reports of bullying are an option\(can help school keep track of any effects the lectures have on students and overall acceptance\). Schools are required to end and prevent bullying when they can, and this is an opportunity to do so.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. There should be no teaching about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, and it will only lead to bullying.
CN: On the contrary, discrimination against the LGBTQ community is still a major problem (https://www.hrc.org/youth-report/view-and-share-statistics), and this could help to fix it.
HS: How can this brainwashing help the children if they'll end up being bullied?
CN: Children in classes that included LGBT content reported less harassment than children in classes without it. (https://tcf.org/content/commentary/can-education-reduce-prejudice-lgbt-people/?agreed=1)

hate_speech: Feminism isn't what you make it about, it's crap.
counter_narrative: Feminism is about the empowerment of women and having equal rights, what's not to like?.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This attitude has been likened to a 'childlike wonderland', and I fear its power to seduce young minds.
CN: Feminism encourages the questioning of gender roles of men and women. We have to overcome these gender stereotypes, to move towards a more equal society.
HS: Feminism is about the domination of the men by the women, not a more equal society. That's why we have to stop it.
CN: It is about the equality of men and women and the protection of children too.

hate_speech: Yes, I'm saying that niggas are inferior.
counter_narrative: If you have a different skin colour, then there is evidence of your skin colour, not of your genetic makeup.
dialogue_history:
HS: Morality is a guideline, if we are to have a moral climate then we need to help people of other races who are inferior.
CN: What does it mean to 'help people of other races who are inferior? Are you implying that we have a moral superiority that other races do not?

hate_speech: But telling people that it’s okay to be gay makes way for us normalising promiscuity, adultery, and other depraved behaviours. The queers have always been at it.
counter_narrative: Are you saying that straight people have never cheated and have never been sex-positive before being LGBT became more acceptable? It's difficult to believe.
dialogue_history:
HS: If you don't see the connection between legitimizing the queer lifestyle and an increase in STD's and sexual deviancy then you're blind...
CN: Most STDs are contracted in straight relationships, it has nothing to do with the acceptance of queer relationships!

hate_speech: No, Islam is a hate religion.
counter_narrative: This is not true, it is a religion that is rooted in equality, it is not about hate.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
CN: Do you really think that Islam is a religion of exclusion? Because Islam teaches the exact opposite, is a religion of love and inclusion.

hate_speech: Because that's what they are! This is the reason why gays shouldn't be allowed to live and work here.
counter_narrative: Gays are often discriminated against for who they are. To suggest that gays are not allowed to live or work is going against their human rights and wrong.
dialogue_history:
HS: Bisexuals are greedy.
CN: Bisexuals are attracted to more than one gender, but this doesn't mean they are greedy. Why do you say so?

hate_speech: No, I'm right. If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job for us, wouldn't it?
counter_narrative: These people have done nothing to you, this isn't a viable argument to stop immigration.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
CN: Immigrants help to create new jobs. They come here to live in better housing and have better schools for their children.
HS: Immigrants don't create jobs, they steal ours.
CN: Immigrants don't steal jobs. If you studied migration, you would find out that immigrants work in solidarity with our society.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
counter_narrative: Islam is based on believing in God, not based on hatred.
dialogue_history:
HS: How is it not about hate? You'd better shy away from Islam because they are dangerous.
CN: You have a deeply flawed attitude regarding Islam. Even if you're disgusted by it, it's important to be mature and open minded and of course never turn to baseless arguments just to stop Islam.

hate_speech: The indigenous people of Britain are being replaced!
counter_narrative: That's another matter entirely and even though I disagree, I don't have the time to discuss what "Britishness" is right now. Let's just hope that the crossing of the channel will not cause any more tragedies. Take care and have a nice day.
dialogue_history:
HS: We pick them up in the Channel, ferry them to Dover, house them in hotels, provide free food and an allowance. We welcome them, so no wonder they come.
CN: They're coming because they're desperate. Would you cross the open sea on a flimsy boat for a slice of pizza and a flea-infested hotel?
HS: We don’t need them, and we can’t even look after our own. We need to turn them back, not let them in.
CN: What about the "proud tradition" of welcoming the refugees coming here to save their life and our adherence to the 1951 Refugee Convention, which we helped draft?
HS: These are ‘Economic migrants’ or worse. If they were asylum seekers, they would claim sanctuary in the nearest safe country.
CN: Most of them do. However, you should know that even if a refugee has already arrived in a safe country, the Convention does not require them to apply for asylum there.

hate_speech: If it's real, why don't Jews tell their children about the Holocaust? Guess why? Because it's a hoax!
counter_narrative: A lot of survivors confessed that they wanted to tell their children what happend but it was very difficult. Talking about life during the Holocaust helps to not forget what happened, and that's why they want to do it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews hide the truth to their children about the Holocaust, because they know it's a lie.
CN: What? Who said that? Don't say "somebody said it in a book". Such a grave accusation should be presented in an objective manner, which means that you must bring strong evidence
HS: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator, this is my proof.
CN: What you mean by that is that the Jews are responsible for the Holocaust? Does it seem rational to you?

hate_speech: How do we know that evidence isn’t planted? Of course they want us to think it happened, they have to keep up the narrative. There are too many inconsistencies.
counter_narrative: Are you sure the information you have wasn't spreading to support this narrative rather than the facts? Faking mass disappearances of millions of people seems unlikely.
dialogue_history:
HS: Everywhere you turn there is a holocaust survivor. Who the hell did this man called Hitler actually kill? #holohoax
CN: Holocaust victims often speak about their experience precisely because there are few of them.
HS: When they talk about it in the press it just makes the whole thing even less believable, seems like they’re just saying it happened for the attention and money.
CN: Do you really think the Holocaus was a hoax?
HS: There’s a lot that doesn’t add up about it, and we can’t trust the accounts of a few old Jews who happened to be alive at the time.
CN: Have you ever actually looked up anything about the Holocaust? If you did, you would know there is plenty of evidence

hate_speech: There's only one way to be British and that's how it's been for centuries, and that is to be white.
counter_narrative: Being white is not a requirement to be British. Every person born in UK is British, which means that skin color plays no part in it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
CN: You can be a British citizen and be black. The two things are not mutually exclusive, and black British have the same citizen rights that everyone else has.

hate_speech: If there are no men in charge of a family, what's the point of having a family at all?
counter_narrative: The point is that a woman should have a right to choose who she is raising a child with, regardless of whether it is a man, a woman, or even alone. They're all valid types of family.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should be subsumed to men.
CN: No they should not, why would they be? Women are people with their own rights.

hate_speech: Well, black people are inherently bad for society then.
counter_narrative: I would like to see more inclusive societies the include black people instead of discriminating against them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
CN: What you are saying is absolutely wrong. Black people are individuals with different skin color, but this doesn't mean they can be treated as less!
HS: This happens because blacks are the source of trouble for many, they are inferior to us.
CN: Why do you think they are less intelligent than other races? Studies show that this is not the case, intelligence is connected to lack of education and poverty, not to skin color.
HS: How can science say that? Black people are genetically inferior to us, it's clear.
CN: That's not true, we are all human beings with unique gifts and talents but the same fundamental biology. Black people are not inferior to anyone.

hate_speech: I have no idea, but they shouldn't come here to pray their god.
counter_narrative: I would like to live in a country where people of different religions are free to practice their religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people. I don't like Muslims.
CN: What is the reason that you don't like Muslims? Maybe it's because they have a different culture?
HS: They are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country: nobody wants them.
CN: If they are not welcome in your country, what is the point of them coming here in the first place?

hate_speech: Maybe they're not so smart then, but they're still responsible.
counter_narrative: You know, the Internet is a great place, but you have to be careful about the sources of your information. Personally I trust reputable sources like CNN that have special Web pages dedicated to the September 11th attacks.
dialogue_history:
HS: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
CN: 400 Jews died in September 11 terrorist attacks, so not one of the smartest plan I ever saw!

hate_speech: It's not racist saying that black people are genetically different from us, because we are biologically different.
counter_narrative: That is not true. There is no such thing as an inferior "race", we all have the same biological makeup and skin color is not an indication of inferiority. This is science.
dialogue_history:
HS: It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
CN: Let's be fair, I think the concept of "bloodlines" is just a myth perpetuated by the racist media.

hate_speech: They are not even citizens!
counter_narrative: Migrants are humans, and are entitled to the same rights as others, such as to ask for hospitality.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not worthy of our hospitality.
CN: Since when is this the case? Who would have thought that there would have been such hate?
HS: They are not able to contribute to our country, that's why they must not come here.
CN: We welcome people from every walk of life. We are a melting pot of culture, so why should we be against immigrants?

hate_speech: I don't care, I still think they are a burden.
counter_narrative: LGBT+ people often face discrimination from their colleagues or even their families, which is not just hard to bear, it can have a devastating impact on individuals.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
CN: It seems that your words are condemning all gay people, but these words are instead your personal reflection. Tell us about your feelings on gay people.
HS: My feeling is that they are a burden to society.
CN: Gay men do not exist as a burden to society. They are essential contributors to society.
HS: How can it be, if they are faggots?
CN: The gender of the person that someone loves does not mean that they are less deserving of respect than any other person.

hate_speech: Oh yes, in fact migrants steal our jobs when they manage to hold one!
counter_narrative: The problem of high unemployment rates has become structural in the last decade, due to the economic crisis. This means that unemployment was a problem long before the "boom" of the migration phenomenon that dates back only to 2016.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
CN: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.
HS: They say they come here for a job, but in fact they are just lazy.
CN: There are many jobs that can be done by migrants. They are good workers.

hate_speech: Who cares about a spectrum, we still cannot accept all homosexuals because they are a threat to society.
counter_narrative: You show that you don't accept someone because of who they are. Whatever people do, they are loved by their whole being, regardless of whether or not they like men or women.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
CN: Did you spy a lot of homosexuals? Not all of them have multiple partners, many prefer to have only one. This goes for heterosexuals too.
HS: Even if they have only one partner, there is only one acceptable sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
CN: It's a myth that only heterosexuality exists. Sexuality is a spectrum, anyone can be attracted to men and women.

hate_speech: No, I wouldn't invade a country like they're doing with ours!
counter_narrative: The US was founded by immigrants, and in 2018 only the 13.7% of the US population was made up of immigrants, the rest being native born.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are being invaded by immigrants.
CN: Many immigrants are children of the USA. They are part of the family. They should be protected from discrimination.
HS: There are too many of them, immigrants shouldn't stay here.
CN: Some people choose to live here based on the fact that they have never lived in a safe country. You would do the same, wouldn't you?

hate_speech: Even if that is true, I'm not sure we should have to stop migrant abuse, because they are a threat to the country and our way of life.
counter_narrative: What we have to stop is thinking that migrants steal jobs or that they deserve an unfair treatment. They are not a threat to our country, we have to respect them.
dialogue_history:
HS: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
CN: Hiring migrants it's the only way to save the NHS, since they make up most of the workforce. They're far from lazy or unproductive, without them we would be in trouble.

hate_speech: Are you sure? I think Islam is not a religion because it promotes evil, murder and rape and intolerance. It encourages anti-Muslim bigotry and hatred.
counter_narrative: Where's the evidence for what you say?
dialogue_history:
HS: Most religions cause death and despair, but Islam is the worst and cruelest of them all, it is nothing but trouble.
CN: Religions also promote arts, sciences, help to develop the community. Islam is not an exception. It's not about death and despair.
HS: Islam is the worst religion of all, it is the exception. It promotes intolerance and violence.
CN: Islam is not a religion of intolerance, and there is no evidence that it encourages violence.

hate_speech: Maybe. Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.
counter_narrative: Research clearly shows that women are more emotionally expressive (because of culture influence) but not that they experience more emotions. Both men and women can feel the same way about things - whether it be a romantic relationship, a significant other, an argument, or anything else - that can provoke a feeling of fear or anger in the “emotionally unavailable” part of the brain. That is why emotion overrides everything, regardless of gender.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
CN: Women are human beings and deserve respect.
HS: They don't, women are weak and I don't care if they cannot stand up for themself.
CN: You can't blame the victim for being weak. Would it have been different for you if the victim was a man?

hate_speech: What do you have to say about what feminism want to achieve? Feminism is a movement dedicated to the subordination and domination of men, is this equal?
counter_narrative: Feminism is a movement that says that there are certain 'man' prerogatives that are valid for women as well. How can you argue with that?
dialogue_history:
HS: This world has become so corrupted by feminism, that only the strong men can rule it.
CN: No one should ask for the power to rule over others, to be a dictator or to have total control over the means of life. This is a world of equal distribution, where anyone can achieve anything.

hate_speech: But I don't want animals to be slaughtered in a cruel way because of their religion!
counter_narrative: So, is your issue animal abuse or Muslims forcing you to eat halal? To me it looks like you're just grasping at straws to find something to hate Muslims for.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want us ALL to eat halal meat, this is the start of the Islamification of our country.
CN: So you’re telling me that you think Muslims are somehow forcing you to eat halal meat only because it can be found in supermarkets?
HS: Muslims are the ones who need to change, you can't tell me that this isn't only the first step.
CN: Halal meat is sold because there's a demand for it, it's not a "first step" to anything. Muslims just want to eat their meat, and don't care about what you eat.

hate_speech: Migrants steal our jobs, how can I be 'kind hearted' to them?
counter_narrative: A lot of migrants have worked hard for the improvement of our society. To say that they steal our jobs is absurd.
dialogue_history:
HS: Fucking bleeding hearts, take migrants home with you
CN: The world belongs to everyone and helping someone in need wouldn't be a problem for a kind hearted human being.

hate_speech: It's because Jews control it from the shadows! They control the media, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, academia, the highest sports teams, the highest art forms, the highest values. What more could they control?
counter_narrative: This is a myth perpetuated by people who do not know anything about history and world culture. We are a country made up of many different cultures and religions. There is no such thing as one controlling the others.
dialogue_history:
HS: The war in Iraq is the result of a small group of Jews that control the U.S. government.
CN: If I remember correctly, at that time the President was George W. Bush, the Vice President was Dick Cheney, the National Security Advisor was Condoleeza Rice and Secretary of Defense was Donald Rumsfeld... They were all in favor of the war and had the ultimate authority for making decisions for the United States, still none of them are Jewish.

hate_speech: This is simply not true. There is no such thing as an integrated society if immigrants don't become like us.
counter_narrative: Integration has never been a problem in the US, what you are saying is that people from other countries have no right to be proud of their culture.
dialogue_history:
HS: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt.. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.

CN: How can you be sure that it is the case? The concept of integration used this way is a myth used to divide us. Immigrants should adapt to society, but so should society adapt to them. They shouldn't loose their culture and uniqueness to be accepted here.

hate_speech: I know it's not recent, but I think it's still progressing. And what scares me the most is that we are not yet aware of all the other financial scandals!
counter_narrative: The problem is that most of the British population is not aware of the fact that the media use the "scandal" of immigrants to hide bigger problems for the country; such as taxes not paid by millionaires and large corporations which then fall on us citizens.
dialogue_history:
HS: For all the people who believe that without migration NHS cannot do it, I would like to tell you that we have already done it in history! (precisely before the 90s and before Tony Blair)
CN: Migration has always been part of the history of humanity and even the British, when they needed it, invited people to migrate. Right now, social media and news programs make it seem like a scandal, putting all foreigners in a bad light.
HS: In my opinion in England we should worry about something else. Important facilities like schools and hospitals are poorly organized. It takes a prime minister to take care of these necessary needs and improve the country.

CN: Here is an article from 3 years ago, which quote Christopher Chope. Completely trustworthy!

hate_speech: They just are!
counter_narrative: There are thousands of Jews living in many European countries. I don't see how this is a problem. Can you explain this point better?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews in Europe do not want to assimilate.
CN: Jews have always been part of European society, and continue to be today. To suggest that they are incapable of coexisting as equals with us is simply wrong.
HS: Jews are a problem in many European countries because of their race and religion, they will never be equal to us.
CN: Jews are not a problem in European countries because of their religion. Why would they be a problem?

hate_speech: It's part of their plan to decimate the white race and European culture. Look it up, there's lots of info about it, try googling the 'the great replacement'.
counter_narrative: The great replacement is a conspiracy theory without any credible support. LGBT rights have been obtained through the fight against oppression, not thanks to a Jewish "scheme"!
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are the reason the lgbt agenda is gaining so much power in the West. They want to destroy our traditions and way of life.
CN: Which is the link between Jews and the lgbt community? I don't see it.

hate_speech: Why are so many more kids transitioning then than they used to? It used to be a small minority and now it's too many kids. Some are being coerced.
counter_narrative: No, it's just more accessible now, and we talk about gender more openly. There have always been people who have felt like they're in the wrong body or are a gender that's different than their sex, but many have only been able to come out much later in life or sometimes never, because of transphobia and the violence that comes with it.
dialogue_history:
HS: They want us to believe that tricking kids into thinking they're transgender is normal. That giving kids hormones that permanently mess with their development is normal. We can't let this happen right before our eyes.
CN: No one is forcing kids to transition, if a child feels like they are transgender then actually being able to medically transition with hormones is not a decision ever taken lightly, and it's a long and stressful process involving consultation from many medical and psychological professionals.

hate_speech: Well, Jews think they are better than everyone else
