counter_narrative: This is not true, in Judaism every person is equal in front of god. In fact, differently from other religions, Judaism says that whoever decides to follows the Seven Laws of Noah (that is a set of laws for all of humanity) will receive the same rewards after death as a righteous Jew. So, even without being Jewish you can have access to God's glory.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews not only run Hollywood, they also control the world economy
CN: Jews have played an important part in the development of the movie industry and some find themselves in high-profile positions. But you only need to watch the Academy Awards to see that Jews do not dominate the movie industry. Likewise, Jews constitute a small minority of the heads of Fortune 500 companies.
HS: Apparently they got to you too. I can't believe people can't see that the Jews control everything, including the government.
CN: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

hate_speech: They don't act like us, they're so disgusting und uncivilised! Europe is not the place for them.
counter_narrative: Since they are EU members and are treated fairly, I would say that this is not true.
dialogue_history:
HS: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
CN: No, hating someone just because of their religion, skin colour or gender is wrong.
HS: It's not, Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: I don't know where you got this idea, how can you say that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe?

hate_speech: We have become too cosmopolitan and tolerant.
counter_narrative: Can you say that someone can be "too tolerant"?
dialogue_history:
HS: Yes, it happens when your nation is floaded with immigrants and loafers.
CN: Loafers? The very powerful working class we always have had, has had many contributions made by immigrants.

hate_speech: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
counter_narrative: This is a simplistic and ill-informed argument, and ultimately it just stirs up more division and negativity, like many other racial and religious divisions that have happened throughout history.
dialogue_history:
HS: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
CN: If it's a cultural issue then they should teach about the N-word only in history classes. Otherwise, it's just another excuse to justify racism.

hate_speech: Women shouldn't have respect and admiration, they shouldn't have any right in a civilised society
counter_narrative: Women should have equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
CN: Women have been oppressed by men. The level of equality that exists today is due, in large part, to the work of women like Germaine Greer.
HS: They should've stayed oppressed! Women have no place in a free and open society. They should just do their housework and raise children without complaining.
CN: Women have other choices than just housework and motherhood. They are human beings with freedom of choice who deserve our respect and admiration.

hate_speech: However, Muslims persecute Christians because they don't want us to choose. They're not peaceful.
counter_narrative: The problem is a lack of human and democratic rights, not Islam.
dialogue_history:
HS: If Islamic law were not for the 24% of the world's population living in the third world, Islam would be extinct long ago.
CN: I've never heard such a thing. Islam is a religion and anyone can choose it or not.

hate_speech: No, it is not about fear. They REALLY are just a bunch of criminal monkeys.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry, but having a particular racial identity doesn't automatically makes someone bad or inferior.
dialogue_history:
HS: Afro-Caribbean's are just a bunch of stupid and dangerous dancing n*ggers, they should be banned.
CN: Hate speech is still directed at people from different ethnic backgrounds, and this is the result of fear towards different ways of life.

hate_speech: I don't see Muslim contributing to my country! They are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: Muslims have been part of our society for centuries and have contributed greatly to our success. I don't see how they could be considered a burden to society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.
CN: Islam is a religion that share the same modern values as other religions.
HS: No, Islam is a degenerate religion, it is a curse that has no place in modern society.
CN: Islam is a religion that has been practiced for centuries in Europe and the Americas, and its teachings are still relevant today. Islam is a peaceful religion, not a curse.
HS: This is a lie, Islam is a disease, a sickness, and an inconvenient enemy of modern society
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. Many Muslims live in the UK, and have contributed greatly to our country.

hate_speech: It shouldn't be a crime when they are a burden, like in the UK for example.
counter_narrative: There is no basis to say that migrants are a burden to the UK. We welcomed many people from all over the world, even from the Middle East and Africa.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions.
CN: Happy-go-lucky? They're probably just grateful they are alive and safe, since migrants often come from dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape...) and migrate as a last resort.
HS: They can be alive and safe somewhere else. Migrants are a burden to the host country, so it is better that they are deported.
CN: The opposite is true: migrants are productive members of society. And even if they were a problem, it's illegal to deport them.

hate_speech: Our society is male-dominated and women have no place in it.
counter_narrative: In my opinion, women and men should be treated as individuals, and the desire to be respected as such exists for a man and for a woman as well.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society.
CN: It doesn't matter what you say about women, they still work a lot to support our society.

hate_speech: Not saying all Muslims are murderers, but many of them are!
counter_narrative: We mustn't confuse murder and Islam, the hate of Muslims is totally unjustified.
dialogue_history:
HS: We do not want Muslims in our country.
CN: There are many Muslims living in the UK, and most of them are good people. Why do you think we shouldn't accept them here?
HS: Because they are all terrorists and are not welcome here.
CN: Muslims are welcome here. The problem arises when they are all lumped together in a category that doesn't describe them at all - in this case, "terrorists".
HS: I don't want to live in a coexistence with them even if they're not terrorists, they are just a bunch of murderers.
CN: The idea that a religion that is all about peace and harmony is made up of murderers is completely without foundation.

hate_speech: Black people are just a bunch of animals that shouldn't exist in our world, I'm not exaggerating.
counter_narrative: Humans are born equal, and we all have the potential to be just as good as we want to be. Why do you think that some people are not human?
dialogue_history:
HS: Another waste of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
CN: We need to focus on identifying the responsible individuals and identifying those who are actively harming others. Would you be happy to be imprisoned if you were innocent?
HS: All blacks are rapists, so you wouldn't never imprison an innocent person
CN: Do you know the data? How about considering that you are generalizing a little bit too much?

hate_speech: I'm sorry, but lesbians tend to have babies out of wedlock. That just doesn't gel.
counter_narrative: I think you wouldn't be able to guess who's gonna have kids out of wedlock just based on sexual orientation. And anyway, having kids out marriage isn't a reason to discriminate someone. This argument is not very logical.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
CN: The only people we can isolate are high-risk groups can be isolated, that is to say all those who have unprotected sex with different partners. Someone doesn't belong to this group by default because of homosexuality.
HS: They do, gays are just sick. Moreover, they cannot marry. It is an abomination
CN: there's no harm in two men or two women loving each other, it's just love.

hate_speech: We have imported millions of criminals with no skills and who deserve no rights.
counter_narrative: It's easier to blame migrants rather than the problem of integration and acceptance, right?
dialogue_history:
HS: The problem is that there is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era. We must deport them.
CN: Your statement indicates that you are very concerned about people's integration, but it is not a solution to deport those that you don't like.

hate_speech: Feminists want women in charge in order to revenge the rapes, I can't trust them.
counter_narrative: Feminists aren't vengeful. Why should we fear a feminist ideology that promotes love and consent?
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminists want to take over the world.
CN: The feminists are a very important voice in society, and should be respected.

hate_speech: If they weren't evil they would have told us about 9/11. Jews had advance knowledge of it and said nothing.
counter_narrative: The 9/11 attacks were perpetrated by members of the terrorist organization Al Qaeda. Jews and Israelis had no knowledge of the attacks. In fact, of the 2,9962 victims who died during the attacks, roughly 400 victims were Jews, including at least two Israeli citizens. If they knew it why didn't they warned and saved their brothers?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
CN: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

hate_speech: I saw an article about how they were putting posters up in a park telling people not to bring their dogs there.
counter_narrative: This story has been refuted, it was actually an anti-Muslim movement aiming to increase Islamophobic hate. Muslims don't care which kind of pet you have!
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are calling for dogs to be banned as pets because they are seen as ‘dirty’ in the Quran! We cannot comply with their agenda.
CN: Where did you see Muslims calling for that? This doesn't sound right

hate_speech: They're not citizens like us, that's why they shouldn't vote
counter_narrative: They are allowed to vote. Why shouldn't they have the right to influence the outcome of their own country's politics?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not be allowed to vote.
CN: Women can vote. They should not be discriminated against just because they are women, they are humans and citizens.

hate_speech: No country should ever welcome them, they're too proud of their ethnicity and never integrate well.
counter_narrative: Maybe if they weren’t in a country where they are attacked and targeted, they would have a easier time adjusting to our society. We have to treat them with respect.
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
CN: That isn’t true, immigrants are protected under the Human Rights Campaign which says that they can stay in a country if they respect its laws. They are welcome here.

hate_speech: Fine, but emotional women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
counter_narrative: Women cannot be denied the right to vote, it is a human right.
dialogue_history:
HS: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
CN: This is a typical case of "reductio ad nazium": we should not be discriminating on the grounds of gender here.
HS: Except that women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. How can I not discriminate them?
CN: Women are not childlike, nor are they "soft and emotional." Their emotions are part of who they are, snd are a part of human nature.

hate_speech: The only right they should have is to shut up. With the exception of divorce and separation, no one talks about them, so why bother?
counter_narrative: Why do you say this about women? Try explaining it to your mother or grandmother.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
CN: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.

hate_speech: I cannot agree with this. Islam is violent and hateful.
counter_narrative: I don't think they are all that hateful, after all peace and harmony is what Islam teaches. Peace is not an attitude, but it must be actively put in practice. And since Islam teaches that all people are created equal, they have a very peaceful basis.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islamic is not a religion of peace, because hate and violence are not so.
CN: Islam is actually a religion about peace, not about hate and violence.

hate_speech: But how many of these 'trans women' are just men dressed as women who are pretending to be trans to gain access to spaces like womens toilets and assault women?
counter_narrative: Since they are trans women, not men, they arent entitled to be seen as women and not 'men in dresses'. Men could simply attack women in their spaces if they really wanted to, without having to pretend to be women. After all, anyone can walk into a public restroom.
dialogue_history:
HS: The trans militia say they're fighting for 'rights' but then insist on pushing ideas that make women unsafe, like allowing men to use women's toilets without question. What is this madness and why are we accepting it??
CN: No one is asking that. The point is that trans women should feel safe in women's toilets because they are actually women. If they used a men's toilet, they could be in danger.

hate_speech: Well, even with brains black people are still subhuman, they should stay in their caves.
counter_narrative: The statement 'black people are subhuman' is not true. They are human beings with a human value.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks don't have brains.
CN: Brain is considered the most basic organ, it has been used by all humans for a very long time. To suggest otherwise is a 'brainless' form of racism.

hate_speech: Well, the Nazis sucked at world annihilation and killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
counter_narrative: If you think that the murder of around 6 million Jews was a failure you have serious problems. It is still 6 million more than should ever have happened.
dialogue_history:
HS: How come Jews don't get internment?
CN: To be fair, Jews weren't only interned during the Nazi occupation. They just got a much harsher treatment. This part of history should never be repeated.
HS: The only reason for Nazis to start WWII was to destroy the Jews. We should have let them finish their job.
CN: The threat of world annihilation by the Nazis was very real, it wasn't just about the Jews. Still the Holocaust was reason enough to stop them.

hate_speech: So they don't care about white lives?? Just what I said, they're racist.
counter_narrative: Groups that fight for a single issue don't have to prove that they care about everyone else. You wouldn't ask LGBT organisations what they do to advocate for straight people! Straight people are already accepted by society and don't face disadvantages because of their sexual orientation.
dialogue_history:
HS: The phrase 'black lives matter' suggests racial superiority. It excludes the importance of anyone elses life. This is racism defined. We cannot bow down to these racists.
CN: If you care about something, you can care about something else too. It's possible to value more than one thing at once.
HS: What do the 'black lives matter' protesters do to show that they support white lives too?
CN: Their purpose is simple: to protest against anti-black racism, so they don't need to show that they care about white lives. White lives already matter thanks to the structural privilege that white people enjoy.

hate_speech: Not all people deserve the same rights as us! Especially not LGBTs.
counter_narrative: LGBT people are people and therefore entitled to the same rights as anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, it’s not about equality or pride, it’s sinister!
CN: The notion that the LGBT fight is NOT about equality is utterly absurd. The only goal of LGBT people is to live their life without discrimination.
HS: It’s not true that it’s about equality! It’s about the destruction of Western culture!
CN: The Western culture is not under threat. We should teach our children about acceptance and love, instead of spreading misinformation about the LGBT community.
HS: Children can't understand this abomination and gays should be kept far away from them.
CN: Gay people are not harmful to children. If we taught them to accept people despite their differences, it might help them in learning about their rights.

hate_speech: It's not natural, lesbianism makes women take on masculine roles that are better suited to men.
counter_narrative: Apparently you don't know any lesbians. We are socialized into gender roles, and whether someone feels more masculine or more feminine is nothing you should care or worry about.
dialogue_history:
HS: It disgusts me when I see women who think they're lesbians. They obviously have a mental illness or haven't found the right man to show them how much happier they'd be in a normal relationship.
CN: Or maybe they're just lesbian so they don't want men. They don't necessarily have to choose to have a relationship with the opposite sex, and their choices don't affect you.

hate_speech: They might exist but they are delusional and seem to make up new genders every day. There are men and women and that’s it.
counter_narrative: Gender is a social construct so it can be a broad spectrum, and sex isn’t as binary as many people believe either, for example there are intersex people and people with different hormone levels or reproductive organs.
dialogue_history:
HS: The trans agenda are anti-science, they don’t listen to logic and facts. Ignoring the biological reality of sex is pure delusion.
CN: There is no ‘agenda’, and they are not ‘anti-science’, they just understand the difference between sex and gender.
HS: Their agenda is being pushed on us through the media and cancelling anyone who criticises them. And they can’t seem to grasp that there’s just 2 sexes.
CN: Mainstream media is actually filled with stories which normalise seeing trans peoples existence as something to debate. It’s not up for debate, they exist.

hate_speech: What about the 9/11 planning then? This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. Jews are all guilty until proven innocent.
counter_narrative: Even if it were true that some people are more prone to believe conspiracy theories, it is still true that we can all benefit from a shared perspective on things. And surely believing in factual evidence does that.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews really want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
CN: The concept of 'Jewish domination' is a constructed myth.

hate_speech: If there are so many survivors, Nazis didn't do their job well enough
counter_narrative: If you think that the murder of around 6 million Jews was a failure you have serious problems. It is still 6 million more than should ever have happened.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
CN: The Nazi killing machine was all too efficient. Survivors lost so much and braved terror and cruelty. They should be celebrated.

hate_speech: And what are they? Women shouldn't be treated as humans: they are all bitches.
counter_narrative: Do you really believe that all women are the same? The human rights of women have to be respected.
dialogue_history:
HS: All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.
CN: All women are human beings. There's a problem when women believe they're subhuman because they were told so.

hate_speech: I didn't say it to be derogatory, she just took it the wrong way, and I should be able to say what I want.
counter_narrative: Sure, you can say what you want, but there's a basic level of respect that you need to have for another person if you want them to treat you with respect back e.g. you can say 'bird' if you want but the woman you said it to can be angry back at you if she wants because she doesn't like being called that!
dialogue_history:
HS: Called a woman a 'bird' the other day and she got mad at me. You can't say anything anymore! Lasses are too easily offended these days.
CN: It's because it's dehumanising and is sometimes used in a derogatory or objectifying way. Maybe refer to women as women and you won't have a problem?

hate_speech: I can't respect them because being gay is an illness, a disorder, a mental issue and should be ignored.
counter_narrative: Being gay is not an illness, nor a disorder, nor a mental disorder. This is just a lack of awareness.
dialogue_history:
HS: Transexuals, queer, and so on... just a rabble of faggots.
CN: This is not true. Being gay is not synonymous with being bisexual, pansexual, intersex, transgender, queer, deviant, lesbian, tranny, queermetaphysical, or whatever term you want to use... We should try to respect people for who they are instead.

hate_speech: Maybe in your mind. But I do not think that migrants have a place here.
counter_narrative: Well, then you need to re read what I said.
dialogue_history:
HS: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt.. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.

CN: Just because some people don't assimilate doesn't mean that they shouldn't be welcome here. Why should we accept that some people will never be accepted as part of a society?
HS: There are many migrants that simply don't want to be part of society at all. We can't have them here, they're here to ruin us!
CN: If some migrants have a hard time integrating it's because of discrimination. To be part of a society is to accept other people's differences, regardless of their ethnicity.
HS: That doesn't make sense, I can't accept this kind of people. They are not and will never be like us.
CN: Society has never been about hate. If we want to live in a productive and thriving society we have to respect and accept all of its members.

hate_speech: There’s so many more black and Asian people on tv now, it’s ridiculous, this is what they’re trying to make us think is ‘normal’.
counter_narrative: Just because there is more representation of ethnic minorities doesn’t mean there’s no white people, it’s just more proportional now. Other people being represented doesn’t mean white people are being ‘erased’ or ‘oppressed’, it just means the industry is more representative of what society actually looks like.
dialogue_history:
HS: Everywhere you look on tv now, white people are being erased. Every advert has mixed race families, openly promoting miscegenation, no white men anywhere. This is all part of their plan to decimate the white race.
CN: There are so many white people on tv, if you think there isn't you're obviously not paying attention!

hate_speech: They are not like us. Queers are a problem because they undermine our society. They undermine all values we hold dear.
counter_narrative: Sorry, but you cannot say what you don't have data for. What you might call a "problem" from a "social" standpoint, I would say is predominantly about economic inequalities, not sexual orientation.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
CN: We should not be so judgmental. Just because someone is LGBT doesn't mean that they are a drain on society. They are like any other member of our community.

hate_speech: But teaching kids about this might encourage them to be gay, they're too young when they're in primary school and very easily influenced.
counter_narrative: Have you heard of the term 'compulsory heterosexuality'? There is a lot of conditioning in our society that assumes all people are straight and forces them to behave in a way in line with this. I wouldn't worry about LGBT relationships being acknowledged in schools 'turning' kids gay when so much of our media and socialisation tells people they are straight.
dialogue_history:
HS: Fags want their agenda taught in schools now, this is harmful to our children and has got to stop!
CN: What exactly have you seen will be taught in schools?
HS: They want learning about LGBT to be part of sex and relationship education. How many children are going to grow up thinking these freaks are 'normal'?
CN: LGBT relationships are normal and completely valid. If we're teaching children about straight relationships, why wouldn't we teach them about other orientations too?

hate_speech: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is good for the economy?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core British values.
counter_narrative: Immigration is a positive force for a thriving country. Your comment is sounding very dramatic. For what reasons does it put us in danger?
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
CN: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?

hate_speech: I think you're the one who's wrong. Islam about death, not peace.
counter_narrative: This is a distortion of what the religion actually stands for: to love one's neighbor as oneself.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult
CN: You are absolutely wrong about Islam. It is a religion of peace. Also, it does not promote violence.

hate_speech: Immigrants that are here illegaly don't deserve human rights. Moreover, the country is overrun by them.
counter_narrative: More than 60% of immigrants in the US have been in the country for at least 15 years, and most of them are here legally. I don't see any illegal immigration invasion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants should all be deported.
CN: There are so many immigrants peacefully living here, why would we need to deport them? They have human rights too, you know.

hate_speech: Yes, except gays. You can read about it in the Bible.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality has been practiced throughout history in all major civilizations. It is just that today's people accept homosexuality as normal and accept people of other backgrounds too.
dialogue_history:
HS: According to the Bible, the gays are an abomination to God.
CN: The Bible clearly teaches that everyone is born equal in dignity with the Lord.

hate_speech: Humankind would be better without black people. They are criminals persecuting white people.
counter_narrative: The truth is, blacks are murdered and persecuted all over the world for being black, it's a very different situation for whites...
dialogue_history:
HS: It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
CN: It's true racism is a part of our society, but it is also true that we must fight it and treat all different races with the same respect.
HS: Black people are genetically different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
CN: You are totally right, our fellow POC citizens will not accept this and will continue to talk about it. It's important to stand for something that you believe in, for example humankind.

hate_speech: What about trans people? No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
counter_narrative: It's possible for women to be men and viceversa. Being transgender is not a crime, since, in the end, we're all equal. It doesn't matter what the "original" gender is.
dialogue_history:
HS: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
CN: It's just a myth that there is only the heterosexual orientation. Sexuality is a spectrum, and attraction could be towards men and women.

hate_speech: It's definitely not. We all suffer from the feminists and feminism, it is an excuse to stifle free speech.
counter_narrative: Hate speech against women is not to be taken lightly, since it can lead to physical harm, discrimination or even murder. Feminists want to stop this, not to suppress freedom of speech.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists are bad for the family.
CN: I disagree, it's good for a family when the mother is an independent woman.

hate_speech: Jews however are the only ones who are a burden on society.
counter_narrative: Every culture has its own distinct ways of life, and Judaism is no exception.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the banks, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
CN: Almost every religion includes an inclination towards politics, from Unitarianism to Buddhism, and of course Judaism.

hate_speech: It could all be set up. I don't know if I believe Auschwitz ever really happened.
counter_narrative: If you think the holocaust is all 'set up' you need to stop reading so many conspiracy theories and get a grip on reality. Not everything is a plot or a scheme, some things are real!
dialogue_history:
HS: Did the holocaust really happen? You can't trust Jews to give you an honest account of anything.
CN: Yes, there's plenty of evidence. Literal camps you can go and visit, 6 million people dead, leaving behind families and loved ones. How can you deny something that there's so much evidence of?

hate_speech:
The NHS is now lost, it should be reorganized from scratch. In addition, young people should have the good sense not to study medicine if these are the consequences! 
Honestly, it is not convenient for colored people to work in European countries. The people here are racist and superficial; it is better if they work where they have studied!
counter_narrative:
The speech did not include anyone's skin color.
The point is that people do not recognize the great contribution that immigrants are giving to England. We must be grateful to those who improve our country, even if the media sometimes state the opposite.
dialogue_history:
HS: 
I firmly believe that Brittany does not need migration. We have physicians and researchers at will, we don't need others from foreign countries.
CN: 
You may not know, but the NHS is mostly made up of first or second generation immigrants.
If there were no more foreigners the health system would fail. Furthermore, the young graduate doctors are all running away from our country, 'cause the working conditions and the treatment received are very bad. The NHS should be better supported so that it offers greater opportunities for our young people.

hate_speech: It is okay, but not here. Let's move them to places with lower homosexuality rate.
counter_narrative: I'm sure you have concerns for gay people and their families. But don't you want to help your country and promote the values of an inclusive society as well?
dialogue_history:
HS: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
CN: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

hate_speech: This is the first time I'm hearing of this, I think you're making it up. Muslims have never contributed this much.
counter_narrative: They actually contributed much more! Their money helps our economy, we are enriched thanks to their expertise and knowledge, their culture, their tasty food. Should I keep going?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are little more than animals, they have no value as human beings.
CN: Muslims have value because they are human beings just like us.
HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, so they have no value.
CN: They have helped us a lot, especially in the fields of science, technology, engineering and mathematics.

hate_speech: The future doesn't matter, Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country now.
counter_narrative: Refugees fleeing war and poverty can come to our country and they gain skills that help our economy grow. They often find new homes and start new careers. For this reason, we are very proud that our country is a model of integration and cooperation and also of resilience and solidarity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Syrians are a burden to Europe and the world, they are a drain on the NHS and they are making us poor.
CN: Do you really want to tell people fleeing from war what to do? If you can't cope in the short term, what hope do we have for the future?

hate_speech: But we cannot keep on letting in the ill-fated immigrants.
counter_narrative: Being an immigrant doesn't mean being unsuited to be in the US. Immigrants are good people that benefit our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt .. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.

CN: There are many people who have settled in the US and have made contributions to our country. If we stop migrants, then we stop also our growth as a society.

hate_speech: But I do not like feminists. They have no place in a democratic society.
counter_narrative: Feminism is a political philosophy, and to claim that feminism is a totalitarian ideology is a complete and total distortion of what feminism is about. It is a movement for equality between the sexes.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is okay to blame feminism. All feminists are bad. We must point out that feminism, or the attack of women against men, should be deleted.
CN: I don't know why you would want to delete feminism. Feminism is a positive force in society and has nothing to do with attacks against men.
HS: It's not true, feminists want to replace men.
CN: Feminism is a movement for equality of rights. It is not a replacement for men's rights.
HS: Equality? Not at all, feminism is a totalitarian ideology, filled with hate and violence.
CN: The notion that feminism is a totalitarian ideology is an attempt to divide society. It is about the equality of the sexes, and it is about building a more just society.
